analyzed: kho na'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyag brkyang ba dag gis kun nas 'don par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: The Bodhisattva who dwells in the abode of the immeasurable cyclic existence delivers immeasurable beings from the ocean of cyclic existence with the outstretched hand of the sublime Dharma.

original: sems can don zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems can don zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: For the sake of beings, etc.

original: gang gi phyir lhag ma med pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzi brjid can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lhag ma med pa mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzi brjid can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the Bodhisattvas who have attained nirvana without remainder are non-existent by nature, they are not able to perform the welfare of beings.

original: de'i phyir sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, the Bodhisattvas, etc.

original: rgyud de nyid kyi phyir sems can byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba srid du 'khor bar bzhugs nas phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'khor bar sku skye ba yongs @187a * //
analyzed: rgyud de nyid kyi phyir sems can byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba srid du 'khor bar bzhugs nas phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'khor bar sku skye ba yongs @187a * //
translated: Because of that very continuum, the bodhisattvas remain in cyclic existence for the sake of sentient beings until the end of cyclic existence.

original: su bzung ba ni sems can gyi don mngon par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: su bzung ba ni sems can gyi don mngon par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: They take up births in cyclic existence in order to manifest the benefit of sentient beings.

original: de dag ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: thams cad dag pa'i chos mchog can //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad dag pa'i chos mchog can // zhes bya ba la /
translated: They have the supreme, pure Dharma.

original: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum gyi ye shes mnga' ba'o //🔽'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te gang gi phyir lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i khams gsum gyi ye shes mnga' ba'o // 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te gang gi phyir lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: They possess the pristine wisdom of the three realms, which is like a reflection.

original: khams thob pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gog par 'gyur bas mthong ba la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed par mi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: khams thob pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gog par 'gyur bas mthong ba la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed par mi nus pa yin no //
translated: This shows that the remainderless nirvana of the sravakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas who have attained the element is cessation, and therefore they are unable to benefit sentient beings by means of seeing and so forth.

original: de las go bzlog pas ni nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de las go bzlog pas ni nus pa yin no //
translated: But the opposite of that is possible.

original: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nges par byas nas /🔽sems can gyi don gyi ched du phyi ma'i mthar thug par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nges par byas nas / sems can gyi don gyi ched du phyi ma'i mthar thug par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas /
translated: Therefore, having ascertained dependent origination to be like a reflection,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor bar bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor bar bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: for the sake of sentient beings, they remain in cyclic existence through non-abiding nirvana.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gzhan gyis kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gzhan gyis kyang /
translated: Also, through other methods of the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa yin te /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa yin te /
translated: non-abiding nirvana is established.

original: de'i phyir / sgrub pa'i rgyud 'dis 'bras bu khyad par thob pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir / sgrub pa'i rgyud 'dis 'bras bu khyad par thob pa med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, this tantra of practice does not obtain a special result.

original: de ni ma yin te ;
analyzed: de ni ma yin te ;
translated: That is not so.

original: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul la //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar ma gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul la // zhes bya ba gsungs te / de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar ma gyur pa ni /
translated: The Tathāgata does not tame.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul ba ste /
translated: The Tathāgata does not tame those who are not to be tamed by the Tathāgata.

original: de'i phyir gang mdo sde pa rnams ma yin pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang mdo sde pa rnams ma yin pa //
translated: Therefore, those who are not of the class of sūtra

original: sngags kyi dpyod pa la dpyod pa de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi dpyod pa la dpyod pa de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul ba ste /
translated: The Tathāgatas do not tame those who are devoted to the analysis of mantras.

original: sngags la mos pa'i sems can rnams la /
analyzed: sngags la mos pa'i sems can rnams la /
translated: For those sentient beings who are devoted to mantras,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa bstan pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mi mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa bstan pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mi mdzad pa'o//
translated: the Tathāgatas do not perform the aim which is characterized by the nirvāṇa that is not a place, by teaching the vehicle of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa sgrub par byed pa'i bag chags sems can de rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa sgrub par byed pa'i bag chags sems can de rnams la med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those sentient beings do not have the habitual tendencies for accomplishing the practice of the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dir rab tu grub ces bya ba la dang po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bsgrub pas sngags kyi tshul 'dir sngags kyi spyod pa la @187b lhag par mos pa'i sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir rab tu grub ces bya ba la dang po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bsgrub pas sngags kyi tshul 'dir sngags kyi spyod pa la @187b lhag par mos pa'i sgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Here, the accomplishment is the perfection of the practice of mantra in this mantra system, by the accomplishment of the vajra with the first secret reality.

original: dngos grub rnams kyi mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos grub rnams kyi mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: The supreme of all powers is the Tathāgata,

original: dus thams cad du bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: dus thams cad du bskyed par bya'o //
translated: who should be generated at all times.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of exclusion.🔽

original: dus thams cad kho nar ro //
analyzed: dus thams cad kho nar ro //
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of restriction.🔽[The dharmatā of phenomena] is always so.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung rung ma byung rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni rtag tu gnas pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung rung ma byung rung chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni rtag tu gnas pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Whether or not the tathāgatas have appeared, the dharmatā of phenomena always abides.

original: thams cad mdzad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams sems can la mdzad pa yin no //🔽gal te bsgrub pa 'di med pas de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba rnams la /
analyzed: thams cad mdzad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams sems can la mdzad pa yin no // gal te bsgrub pa 'di med pas de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba rnams la /
translated: “All deeds” are the powers of the great seal, and so on.🔽If the tathāgatas do not act for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don mdzad par mi dpyod na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don mdzad par mi dpyod na /
translated: those who are not disciplined by the tathāgatas because they do not have this practice,

original: 'o na rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas nus par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas nus par 'gyur te /
translated: then the Great Vajradhara and so on would be able to do so.

original: de bas na 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Therefore, what is the use of this?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na /🔽rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma yin zhe na / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Why is it not so?🔽“The Great Vajradhara and so on” and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams ni /
translated: Because the Great Vajradhara and so on

original: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / rdo rje ki li ki la la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / rdo rje ki li ki la la sogs pa nas /
translated: Vajrasattva, Vajramanonmanī, Vajrakīlaya, and so on,

original: rin chen dril bu'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: rin chen dril bu'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: up to Ratnaghantā,

original: ji ltar bsod nams rnams smin gyis //
analyzed: ji ltar bsod nams rnams smin gyis //
translated: “May merit ripen!”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽bag chags ji lta ba bzhin du sngags pa'i nus pa yod pas de rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / bag chags ji lta ba bzhin du sngags pa'i nus pa yod pas de rnams kyis kyang /
translated: and so on.🔽Since the power of the mantra-practitioner’s habitual tendencies are just as they are, they are able to accomplish the aims of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa yin gyi bag chags med na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi don mdzad par nus pa yin gyi bag chags med na ni ma yin no //
translated: But if there were no habitual tendencies, they would not be.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: skal ba med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mthong ba la sogs pa'i bsgom pa mdzad par mi dpyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skal ba med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mthong ba la sogs pa'i bsgom pa mdzad par mi dpyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not investigate the cultivation of seeing and so on for the sake of unfortunate sentient beings.

original: rang gi las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “One’s own karma”

original: dam pa'i chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i sgrib pas de rnams la sgrib par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i sgrib pas de rnams la sgrib par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: is because they are obscured by the obscurations that accumulate the karma that will abandon the true Dharma.

original: sgrib pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams skal ba med pa de rnams la yang dus thams cad du thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: sgrib pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams skal ba med pa de rnams la yang dus thams cad du thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be known that this obscuration causes the Great Vajradhara and others to act for all beings at all times, even for those who lack good fortune?

original: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang //
translated: Even without entering the mandala,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽sgrub pa po gang zhig dkyil 'khor @188a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / sgrub pa po gang zhig dkyil 'khor @188a * //
translated: and so on.

original: du ma zhugs na yang bsgrub pa 'dis 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi srid pa 'di nyid la myur du grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du ma zhugs na yang bsgrub pa 'dis 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi srid pa 'di nyid la myur du grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The practitioner who has not entered the mandala will quickly accomplish the desired powers in this very life by this practice.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mthong ba la sogs pas bar mtshams med pa nyid du 'khor ba ji srid bar du sems can thams cad rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /🔽kun nas ni dngos po thams cad las so //
analyzed: mthong ba la sogs pas bar mtshams med pa nyid du 'khor ba ji srid bar du sems can thams cad rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste / kun nas ni dngos po thams cad las so //
translated: The Great Vajradhara, who illuminates all sentient beings without interruption until the end of cyclic existence by seeing and so on,🔽is all-around, from all things.

original: dus kun du ni dus thams cad do //
analyzed: dus kun du ni dus thams cad do //
translated: At all times means at all times.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: All means the nature of all things, both animate and inanimate.

original: gang gi phyir dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol bar 'gyur bas na de'i phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol bar 'gyur bas na de'i phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Since it is the bestower of all powers, therefore it is said this is the means of attainment, and so forth.

original: gang gi phyir dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i snying po bsgrub pa 'dis /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i snying po bsgrub pa 'dis /
translated: Since this means of attaining the essence of the first [stage], the secret essence,

original: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso gang yin pa des /
analyzed: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso gang yin pa des /
translated: is the great Vajradhara, the king, the lord of existence, the chief of all,

original: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la yang mthong ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub rab tu stsol ba'i rgyu de'i phyir 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snying po'i sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la yang mthong ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub rab tu stsol ba'i rgyu de'i phyir 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i snying po'i sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu bshad pa ni bstan par bya'o //
translated: he bestows the powers of seeing and so forth even on one who has not entered the maṇḍala. Since that is the reason, the explanation of the cause of perfecting the means of attaining the essence, such as the great seal and so forth, which will be explained below, should be taught.

original: dngos grub ces bya ba la /
analyzed: dngos grub ces bya ba la /
translated: As for power,

original: sgrub pa de nyid phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu gnyis kyi phyir dngos grub bo //
analyzed: sgrub pa de nyid phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu gnyis kyi phyir dngos grub bo //
translated: That very practice is the means of attaining the great seal, etc.

original: dngos grub de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos grub de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is that attainment like?

original: shin tu brtag pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shin tu brtag pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is said to be “extremely firm.”

original: thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' mngon du byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub ste /
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' mngon du byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub ste /
translated: Because it is the cause for manifesting Vajrasattva without beginning or end, the attainment is extremely firm.

original: de bsgrubs pas shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub yin no //
analyzed: de bsgrubs pas shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub yin no //
translated: Since it is accomplished, the attainment is extremely firm.🔽What kind of practice is to be explained?

original: sgrub pa bshad par bya ba de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub pa bshad par bya ba de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa bshad par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: By whom, etc.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi lha'i dbyibs la sogs pa la rang bzhin gyis sgrub pa gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub ni thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rang gi lha'i dbyibs la sogs pa la rang bzhin gyis sgrub pa gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub ni thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub sgrub pa
translated: By whom, by the practitioner, by the one who is practicing the natural practice of the shape, etc. of one’s deity, in this very existence, the attainment of Vajradhara without beginning or end is accomplished.

original: gang gi tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pas thob pa'i sgrub pa de bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pas thob pa'i sgrub pa de bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the practice that is attained by the yogi in this very lifetime will be explained.

original: da ni sgrub pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sgrub pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach that practice,

original: lugs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @188b te ;
analyzed: lugs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @188b te ;
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “the statue, etc.”

original: de dag ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de dag ni bshad zin to //
translated: Those have been explained.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i ni /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i ni /
translated: The secret of great bliss is the vajra.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ste /
translated: The secret maṇḍala is the body of Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid dam tshig go //
translated: That itself is the pledge.

original: de'i de kho na nyid rab tu dga' ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid rab tu dga' ba nyid do //
translated: Its reality is the state of supreme joy.

original: kun du bzang po nyid do //
analyzed: kun du bzang po nyid do //
translated: It is the state of universal good.

original: de'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de nyid dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos grub ste /
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de nyid dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos grub ste /
translated: The practice of that is the cause of the attainment, because it is the cause of the attainment.

original: de'i cho ga rgyas par ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i cho ga rgyas par ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin can 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'o //
translated: The extensive ritual of that is the nature of the various [attainments] that were just explained.

original: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par bsgrub pa bstan nas ;
analyzed: de ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par bsgrub pa bstan nas ;
translated: Thus, having taught the attainment of the special result that is taught in the maṇḍala of the goddess of glorious Vajrasattva,🔽now, in order to teach the attainment of the special result that is taught in the maṇḍala of the god of glorious Vajrasattva, [the Bhagavān] declares, “the statue, etc.”

original: da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa po rnams kyis dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yi ge h'um brjod cing bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa po rnams kyis dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yi ge h'um brjod cing bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Now, all the adepts should form the original vajra fist, saying the letter hūṃ, and bind it.

original: phyi nas phyag rgya gzhan no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi nas phyag rgya gzhan no zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of “afterward, the other seals,”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: then the Bhagavān, etc.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa la'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa la'o //
translated: The word “then” is in the sense of a proper occasion.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Bhagavān is

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Mahāvajradhara.🔽The vajra seal of all tathāgatas is Vajrasattva abiding in the heart of all tathāgatas.

original: de'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i ye shes te /
translated: The gnosis that exists in that is the gnosis of the vajra seal of all tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: which is Mahāvajradhara.

original: snga ma'i sgrub pa la ltos te slar yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kun sdud pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i sgrub pa la ltos te slar yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kun sdud pa'o //
translated: The word again in the phrase again and again refers to the prior practice.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: The phrase this refers to the one who is in the mind.

original: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas phyag rgya thams cad de /
analyzed: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas phyag rgya thams cad de /
translated: It is a seal and it is all, thus it is all seals.

original: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
analyzed: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang / phyag rgya chen po rnams so //
translated: They are the pledge seal, the doctrine seal, the action seal, and the great seal.

original: de rnams bsgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de rnams bsgrub pa ni rdzogs pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The practice of those is the cause of perfection.

original: de bsgrub pa ni rang gi bya ba rdzogs pa'i don yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa ni rang gi bya ba rdzogs pa'i don yod pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of the phrase the practice of that is the existence of the completion of one's own action.

original: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //🔽nyin re zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhag re re bzhin du snga ma'i thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje dbab pa'i rjes thogs kho nar rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas yi ge h'um brjod @189a * //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so // nyin re zhes bya ba la sogs pa la zhag re re bzhin du snga ma'i thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje dbab pa'i rjes thogs kho nar rtog pa thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas yi ge h'um brjod @189a * //
translated: The Bhagavat has spoken of the tantra that teaches that.

original: cing ; dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: cing ; dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Every day and so forth. Every day, at the time of the prior session, the yogin who practices all the contemplations should recite the syllable hūṃ and bind the original vajra right after the vajra descent.

original: de nas de'i rjes la phyis kyi dus su phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar byas nas /
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes la phyis kyi dus su phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar byas nas /
translated: Then, later, at a later time, having bound all the seals such as the great seal,

original: rang gi las kyi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi las kyi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: one accomplishes one’s own spiritual powers.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcing ba'i sgrub pa 'dis rtog pa thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rtog pa thams cad la ji ltar bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcing ba'i sgrub pa 'dis rtog pa thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rtog pa thams cad la ji ltar bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams
translated: “By this” means that by this practice of binding the original vajra, all conceptualizations, all mundane and supramundane conceptualizations, all seals as explained, the great seal and so forth,

original: cad mdor bsdus pas rang gis rang nyid bcings nas bsgrub pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing grub par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: cad mdor bsdus pas rang gis rang nyid bcings nas bsgrub pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing grub par 'gyur bas /
translated: are bound by oneself in brief, and one becomes empowered and accomplished.

original: de'i phyir ma bsgrub kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir ma bsgrub kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, even without practice, one will be accomplished.

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings pa las dus phyis sngar bshad pa'i rang gi snying po brjod pa med kyang phyag rgya de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings pa las dus phyis sngar bshad pa'i rang gi snying po brjod pa med kyang phyag rgya de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: After binding the original vajra, later, even without reciting one’s own essence mantra as previously explained, those seals will be accomplished.

original: de ltar dang po'i rdo rjes bcings nas /
analyzed: de ltar dang po'i rdo rjes bcings nas /
translated: Thus, having bound with the first vajra,

original: phyag rgya gzhan yang bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya gzhan yang bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan nas /
translated: one should bind the other seals.

original: re zhig spyod lam bzhi pos chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: re zhig spyod lam bzhi pos chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having taught that, in order to demonstrate the meaning of “one should accomplish all dharma-seals with the four modes of conduct,”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags bsgrub pa gsungs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags bsgrub pa gsungs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: then the Blessed One spoke of the mantra accomplishment of the reality of Vajradharma.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The word “then” is as before.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: “Blessed One” is Great Vajradhara.

original: chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
translated: “Dharma” is mind and mental factors that have the nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa yin la de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni lha thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge rnams te de'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa yin la de'i gsang ba'i sngags ni lha thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge rnams te de'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Their “reality” is natural purity. The “mantra” of that is the dharma-letters of all the deities. The “accomplishment” of that is spoken of.

original: langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am //
analyzed: langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am //
translated: Standing, sitting,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la lce la rdo rje dge ba rnam par bsams te /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la lce la rdo rje dge ba rnam par bsams te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of one’s deity, one should imagine a vajra on one’s tongue.

original: rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya bkod nas /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya bkod nas /
translated: Having arranged the Dharma-seal of one’s deity,

original: de nyid slar yang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba rdo rje khro bo'i rnal 'byor ram /
analyzed: de nyid slar yang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba rdo rje khro bo'i rnal 'byor ram /
translated: one should again visualize that very [seal] as the yoga of Vajrasattva, or the Tathāgata, or the Vajra Wrath of the Joy,

original: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la dgod par bya'o //
translated: or the yoga of his family, and place it on the sattva-vajra in one’s heart.

original: padma dang rin @189b po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas ni rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma la bkod de /
analyzed: padma dang rin @189b po che'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas ni rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma la bkod de /
translated: The yoga of the Padma and Ratna families should be placed on the sign of one’s own family in one’s heart.

original: de nyid brjod cing rang gi lha'i sku gzugs brnyan bzhin du langs pa'am 'dug pas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid brjod cing rang gi lha'i sku gzugs brnyan bzhin du langs pa'am 'dug pas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting that very [mantra], one should meditate standing or sitting like the reflection of one’s deity’s form.

original: thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: The yoga of universal passion is here the nature of natural purity.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
translated: All powers are attained.

original: rigs thams cad kyi rang gi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya grub pa ni /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi rang gi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya grub pa ni /
translated: The powers of all the deities of all the families

original: dngos grub thams cad de /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad de /
translated: are all powers.

original: de thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are attained.

original: de ltar phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the practice of the seal,🔽now, in order to teach this rite,

original: da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa pos yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: whereby the practitioner of the action seal, having imagined a variegated vajra at his heart from the letter A, binds the action seal,

original: rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing /🔽gar gyi tshul gyis sam /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing / gar gyi tshul gyis sam /
translated: recites the essence mantra of his deity,🔽and worships with the method of dance

original: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas mchod pa bya zhing ;
analyzed: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas mchod pa bya zhing ;
translated: or with the twelve seals,

original: gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi lha bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi lha bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and meditates on his deity with the method of dance,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the Bhagavān then spoke the Tantra of the Practice of the Secret of Action Thatness.

original: las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa ni phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi gar gyi mchod pa 'bul ba'am /
analyzed: las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa ni phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi gar gyi mchod pa 'bul ba'am /
translated: The practice of the reality of the secret of action is the offering of the dance of the twelve mudras.🔽

original: gar gyi tshul gyis bsgom pa ste de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: gar gyi tshul gyis bsgom pa ste de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: The practice of the reality of the secret of action is the offering of the worship of the dance of the twelve seals, or the meditation in the manner of the dance. The Bhagavat taught the Tantra which reveals that.

original: gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa la //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa la // zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the supreme worship of the secret dance,🔽one should perform the worship of the dance of the twelve seals.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas ;
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin du byas ;
translated: Having performed one's deity yoga just as it is,

original: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should bind the seal of one's deity.

original: de nas gar gyi tshul gyis bsgom par bya zhing rang gi lha bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gar gyi tshul gyis bsgom par bya zhing rang gi lha bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate in the manner of the dance and accomplish one's deity.

original: yang na mchod pa ci bde bar //
analyzed: yang na mchod pa ci bde bar //
translated: Or, one should perform the worship as one likes.

original: zhes bya ba la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yang dang yang du bya zhing rang gi lha bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yang dang yang du bya zhing rang gi lha bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should perform again and again the worship of the seal with its twelve aspects and accomplish one's deity.

original: de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor bsgoms na /
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor bsgoms na /
translated: Thus, if one always meditates on the yoga,

original: cho ga 'dis mchog gi dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cho ga 'dis mchog gi dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will quickly attain the supreme accomplishment by this rite.

original: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the practice of the karma consort,🔽now, in order to teach this rite,

original: da ni rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu @190a * //🔽bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu @190a * // bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: which states, “Reciting the essence mantra of one’s deity, one should meditate on the great seal of one’s deity,”

original: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Then the Tantra of the Practice of One’s Own Seal.”

original: rang gi phyag rgya ni rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya ni rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: One’s own seal is the great seal of one’s deity.

original: des bdag nyid sgrub pa ni rang gi rgyud la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i sku rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: des bdag nyid sgrub pa ni rang gi rgyud la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i sku rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The practice of oneself by means of that is the completion of the body of the seal of one’s deity in one’s continuum.

original: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great seal is equipoise.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste /🔽cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la ye shes sems dpa' bcug ste / cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of one’s deity by means of the rite as previously explained, one should cause the wisdom-being to enter.

original: rang gi snying po lan cig bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying po lan cig bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Having performed all the rites, one should bind the great seal and recite one’s essence mantra.

original: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens by doing it that way?

original: brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags //
analyzed: brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags //
translated: It is stable, very pleased, and fully passionate.

original: shin tu rgyas 'gyur bdag po 'grub //
analyzed: shin tu rgyas 'gyur bdag po 'grub //
translated: It becomes very extensive, and the lord is accomplished.

original: ces bya ba la brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Here, stable means inseparable.

original: shin tu mnyes par gyur pas na shin tu dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu mnyes par gyur pas na shin tu dgyes pa'o //
translated: It is very pleased because it is very pleased.

original: thugs gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing yang dag par zhen pas na kun tu chags pa'o //
analyzed: thugs gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing yang dag par zhen pas na kun tu chags pa'o //
translated: It is fully passionate because it is fully passionate and does not turn its mind to anything else.

original: khyad par du 'phel bar 'gyur bas na shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phel bar 'gyur bas na shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It becomes very extensive because it increases in a special way.

original: bdag po ni sgrub pa 'dod pa'i lha'i sku'i rang bzhin can phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag po ni sgrub pa 'dod pa'i lha'i sku'i rang bzhin can phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The lord is accomplished by the accomplishment of the great seal, which has the nature of the body of the deity that one wishes to accomplish.

original: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the accomplishment of the great seal,

original: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa pos ri bhi ta la sogs pa'i byed pa'i khams kyi glu rgyan dang bcas pa lnga yi ge h'um brjod cing bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan🔽par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa pos ri bhi ta la sogs pa'i byed pa'i khams kyi glu rgyan dang bcas pa lnga yi ge h'um brjod cing bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the meaning of “the practitioner of Vajrasattva should accomplish the Blessed Glorious Vajrasattva with the song ornaments of the elements of action such as the ri bhi ta, and so on, and the syllable hūṃ,”

original: de nas yi ge h'um gis glu blang ba grub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge h'um gis glu blang ba grub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, the tantra called the Song of the Accomplishment of the Syllable Hūṃ.

original: yi ge h'um nyid glu ste yi ge h'um gi glu'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um nyid glu ste yi ge h'um gi glu'o //
translated: The syllable hūṃ itself is the song, the song of the syllable hūṃ.

original: de blangs pas grub pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa'o //
analyzed: de blangs pas grub pa ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa'o //
translated: By singing that, there is accomplishment, the attainment of Glorious Vajrasattva.

original: ri bhi ta sogs rgyan dang ldan //
analyzed: ri bhi ta sogs rgyan dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the ornaments such as the ri bhi ta.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: With regard to that,

original: ri bhi ta zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i khams te /
analyzed: ri bhi ta zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i khams te /
translated: ri bhi ta is the element of action,

original: pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams la rab tu grags pa yin no //
analyzed: pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams la rab tu grags pa yin no //
translated: well known in the musical instruments such as the vīṇā.

original: sogs pa'i skras ni ni da dang / ni la ti ta dang / hra da dang rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ste bzhi shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i skras ni ni da dang / ni la ti ta dang / hra da dang rjes su 'brel pa zhes bya ba ste bzhi shes par bya'o //
translated: the ornament of the middle, and🔽the ornament of the end, etc.🔽The ornament of the end, etc. is the ornament of the end, etc.

original: ri da la sogs pa'i rgyan ni ri da la sogs pa'i rgyan te rid la sogs pa'i de rnams dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ri da la sogs pa'i rgyan ni ri da la sogs pa'i rgyan te rid la sogs pa'i de rnams dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with those, the end, etc.

original: ci nus pa zhes bya ba la nus pa @190b dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: ci nus pa zhes bya ba la nus pa @190b dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: As much as possible means in accordance with one's ability.

original: ci 'dod par zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod par zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: As one wishes means in accordance with one's own desire.

original: blangs nas zhes bya ba ni glur blangs nas so //
analyzed: blangs nas zhes bya ba ni glur blangs nas so //
translated: Having taken up means having sung.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: gandha rbha zhes bya ba'i glu ste dbyangs bdun gyi rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: gandha rbha zhes bya ba'i glu ste dbyangs bdun gyi rang bzhin can no //
translated: The song called Gandharva, which has the nature of seven melodies.

original: dang po ni da ltar byung ba ste /
analyzed: dang po ni da ltar byung ba ste /
translated: The first is the present,

original: rang bzhin gyis rtag tu gnas pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rtag tu gnas pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: which naturally always abides, and is accomplished.

original: yi ge gang gis she na /
analyzed: yi ge gang gis she na /
translated: By which syllable?

original: yi ge h'um gis so //
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis so //
translated: By the syllable hūṃ.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de kho na nyid chen po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid chen po zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for great reality,

original: de kho na nyid kyang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na de kho na nyid chen po ste /🔽thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na de kho na nyid chen po ste / thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: It is the reality, and it is the great one, thus it is the great reality.

original: de'i gsang ba'i dngos grub ni /
analyzed: de'i gsang ba'i dngos grub ni /
translated: It is the basic element of the Dharma, which is without beginning or end.🔽Its secret powers are the powers of the great seal, etc.,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub po //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub po //
translated: as taught in the mandala of Vajrasattva.

original: de bsgrub pa ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa de nyid do //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa ni 'das ma thag tu bshad pa de nyid do //
translated: Its practice is just that which was explained immediately above.

original: rgyud ces bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba yang ngo //
translated: The tantra is also that.

original: ri bhi ta la sogs pa'i khams lnga rgyan dang bcas pa rnams kyis yi ge h'um gis dang por gandha rbha blang zhing /
analyzed: ri bhi ta la sogs pa'i khams lnga rgyan dang bcas pa rnams kyis yi ge h'um gis dang por gandha rbha blang zhing /
translated: The five elements, such as earth, along with their ornaments, are taken up with the syllable hum, and🔽one should meditate on the one hundred deeds for the sake of accomplishing the Bhagavat Vajrasattva himself.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir las brgya rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir las brgya rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of that,

original: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: he says, “Then, the seal of all contemplations,” and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //🔽rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyang yin pas na /
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o // rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyang yin pas na /
translated: The word “then” is used in the sense of “at that time.”🔽Since it is a concept and it is the reality of all,

original: rtog pa thams cad de /
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad de /
translated: it is the concept of all.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'o //🔽de'i las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'o // de'i las sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni /
translated: It is the concept of the glorious Vajrasattva’s secret mandala.🔽The action seals that accomplish its actions

original: las kyi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya ste /
translated: are the action seals.🔽The tantra that teaches them should be explained.

original: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phrin las can gyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phrin las can gyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
translated: This is what the Blessed One, Vajrasattva, whose activity is without beginning or end, said.

original: thog ma tha ma med pa ni shin tu tshe ring zhing 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las rnams gang la yod pa de ni thog ma tha ma med pa'i phrin las can no //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med pa ni shin tu tshe ring zhing 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las rnams gang la yod pa de ni thog ma tha ma med pa'i phrin las can no //
translated: One whose activity is without beginning or end is one who has the activity of long life and increase, etc.

original: shin tu tshe ring zhing 'phel ba zhes bya ba tshe ring ba ni bskal pa la sogs pa dus kyi grangs las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu tshe ring zhing 'phel ba zhes bya ba tshe ring ba ni bskal pa la sogs pa dus kyi grangs las 'das pa'o //
translated: Long life and increase means that life is beyond the enumeration of time such as eons, etc.

original: shin tu yang yin la tshe ring ba yang yin pas na shin tu tshe ring ba ste srog go //🔽'phel ba ni gong nas gong du skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das @191a * //
analyzed: shin tu yang yin la tshe ring ba yang yin pas na shin tu tshe ring ba ste srog go // 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das @191a * //
translated: Since it is very long and also life, it is very long life, that is, life force.

original: pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Its increase is its completion through the stream of moments, which is the nature of nirvana without remainder.

original: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does that occur?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje chos so //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje chos so //
translated: The great bliss is the vajra dharma.

original: dang po'i rdo rje ni /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje ni /
translated: The first vajra

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i tshe ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i tshe ste /
translated: is the vajra life of great bliss.

original: des de 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: des de 'byung ba yin no //
translated: That is how it occurs.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being taught:🔽Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva through the ritual

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: taught in the Secret Mandala,

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: having analyzed all the rituals, one should bind the first vajra,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i zla ba dang / spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi snying ga'i zla ba dang / spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsgoms la /
translated: and meditate on glorious Vajrasattva residing on the moon in one's heart and on the moon mandala at the crown of one's head.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis sgrub pa po'i lus ma lus pa gang bar byed pa zla ba phyed kyi bar nyin re zhing /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis sgrub pa po'i lus ma lus pa gang bar byed pa zla ba phyed kyi bar nyin re zhing /
translated: The moon mandala is filled with streams of nectar, which fill the entire body of the practitioner, for half a month, every day.

original: lan cig byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
analyzed: lan cig byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
translated: Having performed the consecration once,

original: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
analyzed: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
translated: in the end, if one meditates throughout the night,

original: tho rangs rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: tho rangs rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'i tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: at dawn, one will become like Vajrasattva, with the vajra life force.

original: dang po'i rdo rje spyi bo'i phyogs su bzung zhing bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje spyi bo'i phyogs su bzung zhing bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: The first vajra should be held and meditated on in the head region.

original: shin tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shin tu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Increasing the youthful state

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du lo bcu drug lon pa'i rnam pa can gyi na tshod rdzogs pa ni shin tu gzhon pa'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du lo bcu drug lon pa'i rnam pa can gyi na tshod rdzogs pa ni shin tu gzhon pa'o //
translated: means that the complete youthful state of sixteen years of age, like glorious Vajrasattva,

original: de gong nas gong du 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du 'jug pa ni 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: de gong nas gong du 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du 'jug pa ni 'phel ba'o //
translated: increases more and more, as long as there is cyclic existence.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the great bliss vajra elixir.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len no //
translated: The great bliss is the elixir of the vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Vajrasattva is the great bliss.

original: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni /
translated: His great seal is the great bliss.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje bcud kyis len te /
translated: The elixir of the vajra is the great bliss.

original: des de thob par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: des de thob par 'gyur ro//
translated: By that, one attains it.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following:

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: In the same way, one should perform the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad nas /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad nas /
translated: Having analyzed all the rites,

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: one should bind the first vajra.

original: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya'o //
translated: One should drink the elixir from the middle vajra.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dbus ma'i rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rdul phra rab kyi bcud kyis len gyi rgyud kyis kyang kha gtang bar bya ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dbus ma'i rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rdul phra rab kyi bcud kyis len gyi rgyud kyis kyang kha gtang bar bya ste /
translated: One should also open the mouth with the tantra of the elixir of the subtle particles of Vajrasattva, which arises from the middle vajra of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: lus thams cad khyab par bsam par byas na /
analyzed: lus thams cad khyab par bsam par byas na /
translated: Having visualized it pervading the entire body,

original: de ltar na tshod shin tu gzhon pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //🔽gzugs chen po dang gzi @191b brjid 'phel bar zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ltar na tshod shin tu gzhon pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //🔽gzugs chen po dang gzi @191b brjid 'phel bar zhes bya ba la /
translated: in that way, one's youth will increase.🔽One's body will become very youthful.

original: gzugs chen po ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: gzugs chen po ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o //
translated: The great form is the thirty-two marks of a great person and the eighty minor characteristics.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu'i mthu ni gzi brjid chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bu'i mthu ni gzi brjid chen po'o //
translated: The power of Vajrasattva is the great splendor.

original: de dag 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du rab tu 'jug ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag 'phel ba ni gong nas gong du 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du rab tu 'jug ba yin no //
translated: Their increase is their progression higher and higher for as long as cyclic existence lasts.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so zhes bya ba la /🔽bde ba chen po rdo rje gzugs kyi gzi brjid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so zhes bya ba la / bde ba chen po rdo rje gzugs kyi gzi brjid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: By the splendor of the form of great bliss vajra.🔽The splendor of the form of the great bliss vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid do //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid do //
translated: The seal of that is the splendor of the form of the great bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
translated: Do all that in the same way.

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma dang mthe bo dang mthe'u chung rnams kyis rtse mo'i tshul du byas te rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs la phyag rgya rang gi gdong du dgrol bar byas te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma dang mthe bo dang mthe'u chung rnams kyis rtse mo'i tshul du byas te rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs la phyag rgya rang gi gdong du dgrol bar byas te /
translated: With the middle finger of the first vajra and the thumb and little finger, make the form of a peak, purify one’s face, and release the seal on one’s face.

original: rang gi gdong la rab tu zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas kyang lus thams cad khyab cing rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi gdong la rab tu zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas kyang lus thams cad khyab cing rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: And the Blessed One Vajrasattva, who has entered into one's face, is thought to pervade the whole body and become Vajrasattva.

original: de ltar na gzugs chen po dang / gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs chen po dang / gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one's form becomes great and one's splendor increases.

original: 'du byed thams cad 'phel ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad 'phel ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The increase of all the formative forces is as follows:

original: 'du byed kyang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na 'du byed phung po ste ;
analyzed: 'du byed kyang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na 'du byed phung po ste ;
translated: The formative forces are also the great aggregates, and so they are the aggregate of formative forces.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: The aggregate of formative forces is the nature of the perfection of effort of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de 'phel ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de 'phel ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The increase of that is as before.

original: de ji ltar zhe na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'du byed chen po ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa ste
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'du byed chen po ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa ste
translated: How is that? By the great formative force of great bliss. The great formative force of great bliss is Vajrasattva, who is of the nature of Amoghasiddhi. His seal is the seal of the great formative force of great bliss.

original: de ni bde ba chen po'i 'du byed chen po'o //
analyzed: de ni bde ba chen po'i 'du byed chen po'o //
translated: This is the great formation of great bliss.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te /🔽de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te / de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga thams cad rjes su dpyad la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rang gi lus thams cad du bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus thams cad du bskor bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, having analyzed all the rituals of the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the first vajra and rotate it throughout one’s entire body.

original: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub par bsgom zhing snying gar phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o //🔽'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i sku @192a * //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub par bsgom zhing snying gar phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i sku @192a * //
translated: Then, visualizing oneself as Amoghasiddhi, the Tathāgata, one should release the seal at the heart.

original: rnams rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya ste de ltar 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnams rang gi snying gar gzhug par bya ste de ltar 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should cause the forms of Amoghasiddhi, the Tathāgata, equal to the atoms of all world-realms, to enter one’s heart. In this way, all the great formations increase.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung bar bya ba la /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung bar bya ba la /
translated: In order to protect all the entities of all sentient beings,

original: sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas sems can thams cad de /
analyzed: sems can yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas sems can thams cad de /
translated: those who are sentient beings and those who are all are the sentient beings.

original: de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The nature of those is the nature of all sentient beings.

original: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po'o //

original: de thams cad bsrung ba ni thams cad bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: de thams cad bsrung ba ni thams cad bsrung ba'o //
translated: Protecting all of that is protecting all.

original: de ltar 'gyur zhe na /🔽bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung bas so zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur zhe na / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung bas so zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung ba ni /

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi gzungs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi gzungs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The protection of the great bliss vajra is the vajra being endowed with the uṣṇīṣa retention of Vajrasattva.

original: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
translated: The seal of that is the protection of the great bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bsrung bar bya ba'i sems can dang yid kyis gcig tu byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bsrung bar bya ba'i sems can dang yid kyis gcig tu byas la /
translated: Similarly, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the original vajra and make the protected sentient being one with oneself mentally.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan gyi rang bzhin can du bdag nyid bsgom zhing dang po'i rdo rje spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan gyi rang bzhin can du bdag nyid bsgom zhing dang po'i rdo rje spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar byas te /

analyzed: de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In this way, one protects the whole nature of all sentient beings.

original: phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The binding of all directions, quarters, and the mandala has been explained.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the great bliss vajra wheel.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: Thus, by the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one binds the original vajra,🔽and by the thought of binding the directions, one should rotate it in the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcing ba'i bsam bas phyogs bcur bskor bar byas na phyogs thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis bar mtshams med par khyab par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: phyogs bcing ba'i bsam bas phyogs bcur bskor bar byas na phyogs thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis bar mtshams med par khyab par 'gyur ba yin te /

original: de ltar na phyogs thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ba yin no //

original: de nyid mtshams bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid mtshams bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
translated: One should rotate it in the manner of binding the boundary,

original: de ltar na rdo rje'i mtshams bcing bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rdo rje'i mtshams bcing bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and in that way one binds the boundary of the vajra.

original: de nyid dkyil 'khor bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid dkyil 'khor bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
translated: One should rotate it in the manner of binding the maṇḍala,

original: de ltar na dkyil 'khor bcing bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dkyil 'khor bcing bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and in that way one binds the maṇḍala.

original: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of doing it that way?

original: thams cad rdo rje khro bo'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po ni rdo rje h'um mdzad de des @192b kyang zhugs par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad rdo rje khro bo'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po ni rdo rje h'um mdzad de des @192b kyang zhugs par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since all are of the nature of Vajra Wrath, the great king of vajra wrath, Vajra Hūṃkara, is also unable to enter and is split.

original: sdig pa thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Protecting from all evil” means

original: sdig pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sdig pa thams cad de /
analyzed: sdig pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sdig pa thams cad de /
translated: that since it is evil and also all, it is all evil.

original: sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi lus can gyi lha'i gzugs so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi lus can gyi lha'i gzugs so //
translated: It is the form of a god with a māra body that harms all sentient beings.

original: de rnams las thams cad du bsrung bas na sdig pa thams cad bsrung ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams las thams cad du bsrung bas na sdig pa thams cad bsrung ba ste /
translated: Since one protects from all of them, it is protecting from all evil.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams las rang gi sems bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams las rang gi sems bsrung ba'o //
translated: It is the protection of one's mind from the afflictions and secondary afflictions such as desire.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Blessed by the great bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva,

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: one should bind the first vajra🔽and, with the thought of binding the armor, place it at the heart, and with the mind,

original: go cha bcing ba'i bsam pas snying gar bzhag la sems kyis rgyu ba dang / de nas dpung pa gnyis dang / spyi bo dang dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi phreng ba bcings te /
analyzed: go cha bcing ba'i bsam pas snying gar bzhag la sems kyis rgyu ba dang / de nas dpung pa gnyis dang / spyi bo dang dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi phreng ba bcings te /
translated: then at the two shoulders, the crown, and the forehead. Having placed it, one should bind the garland with the two vajra fists.

analyzed: snying ga'i phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi go cha bcing bar bsam par bya'o //

original: de bzhin du mgrin pa'i steng dang / slar yang snying ga dang / de nas nu ma'i bar dang / slar yang snying ga dang / de nas mgrin pa'i steng dang / dpral ba'i steng dang / de nas snying gar bcing ba'i tshul gyis rna ba gnyis kyi steng du nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa byas la mthar dar dpyangs su byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mgrin pa'i steng dang / slar yang snying ga dang / de nas nu ma'i bar dang / slar yang snying ga dang / de nas mgrin pa'i steng dang / dpral ba'i steng dang / de nas snying gar bcing ba'i tshul gyis rna ba gnyis kyi steng du nam mkha' lding gi gshog pa byas la mthar dar dpyangs su byas te /
translated: and again at the heart, one should bind in the manner of the wings of Garuḍa above the two ears, and finally make a streamer.

original: 'di ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: This is the consecration of the great bliss vajra.

original: 'dis sdig pa thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis sdig pa thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one is protected from all evil.

original: bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dam /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dam /
translated: One should make all one’s own things,🔽or others, into a vajra.

original: gzhan dag rdo rjer byed pa zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag rdo rjer byed pa zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje go chas so //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje go chas so // zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the great bliss vajra armor.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the first vajra.

analyzed: rdo rje bsrung bar bdag nyid bsams nas bdag nyid go cha'i bsam pa'am /
translated: Having visualized oneself as Vajravarada, with the thought of one's own armoring,

analyzed: gzhan bsrung ba'i bsam pas phyag rgya de snying ga'am /
translated: or with the thought of protecting others, one should hold that seal at the heart,

analyzed: dpral ba'am / spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste /
translated: or on the forehead, or at the crown of the head.

analyzed: de ltar na bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad dam gzhan dag gi rdo rje nyid du byed par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal @193a * // ba zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: mchog dang mchog ma yin pa'i 'thab mo kun las rnam par rgyal ba ni 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: Victory in all battles, whether supreme or not, is victory in all battles.

analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so zhes bya ba la /
translated: How is that? By the great bliss vajra victory banner supreme armlet.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva,

analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te gyen du drangs la sor mo dbus ma gnyis dar gyi ba dan gyi tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste /
translated: First, bind the first vajra and draw it up, holding the two middle fingers in the manner of a silk banner.

analyzed: phyag rgya bcing ba de las kyang yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs spros la de yis pha rol gyi dpung gsad par bya ste /
translated: From that binding of the seal, emanate the four-branched army and with that slay the enemy army.

analyzed: de ltar na 'thab mo kun las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, one will be victorious in all battles.

original: 'thab mo bsrung ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'thab mo bsrung ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Protecting the battle is as follows.

analyzed: 'thab mo thams cad las bdag nyid kyi dpung bsrung ba ni 'thab mo bsrung ba'o //
translated: Protecting one's own army from all battles is protecting the battle.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: With the great-bliss vajra that cannot be overcome by others.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, bind the first vajra and

analyzed: bdag nyid 'phags pa byams par rnam par bsams la byams pa'i go chas lus thams cad byugs shing des bsrung bar byas te /

analyzed: de ltar na 'thab mo thams cad las bsrung bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: Thus, one is protected from all battles.

analyzed: / pha rol gyi dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The destruction of all enemy armies is easy to understand.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?🔽By the great bliss vajra-frightening.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje 'jigs par byed pas so zhes bya ba de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bdag nyid zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin du rnam par bsams la
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje 'jigs par byed pas so zhes bya ba de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bdag nyid zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin du rnam par bsams la
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, having bound the original vajra, having contemplated oneself as Vajrayakṣa with a terrifying face and bared fangs,

analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa'i lta bas blta zhing steng du kha bltas pas khro bo'i bzhad pa bya ste /

translated: Holding the upward-facing face mudrā at one's mouth, and also emanating Vajrayakṣa rākṣasas and vetālas from one's mouth, one should have them consume the other's army.

analyzed: de ltar na gzhan gyi dpung thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, all enemy armies will be frightened.

analyzed: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad nyams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: All the armies of others are destroyed, and so forth.

analyzed: nyams pa ni dman pa ste stobs chung ba nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: Destruction is the inferior, that is, the weak state.

analyzed: de nyid las gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i nus pa bskyed pa @193b ni ldang ba'o //
translated: Overpowering is the generation of the power to overcome others.
