analyzed: rgyas btab pa ni thams cad snying ga'i zla ba rnams la 'bar ba'i rdo rje bskyed pa'o //
translated: The seal is the generation of the blazing vajra on the moon at the heart of all.

original: ltung ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ltung ba ni go sla'o //
translated: The fall is easy to understand.

original: gsad pa ni bya ba byed pa med pa dang / shin tu gsad pa'o //
analyzed: gsad pa ni bya ba byed pa med pa dang / shin tu gsad pa'o //
translated: Killing is the absence of activity and the complete killing.

original: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is all that done?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so zhes bya ba la ;
translated: By the flashing of the vajra of great bliss.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bdag nyid drag po chen po'i bdag po rdo rje h'um mdzad zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa rdo rje'i rigs spro ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs par rnam par bsams la /

translated: In the same way, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, having bound the original vajra, one should imagine oneself as the lord of great wrath, Vajrahumkara, with four faces and eight arms, abiding in the manner of emitting the vajra family.🔽 Then, having made the seal of the great vajra, one should recite the essence mantra of the great vajra: Vajra krodha hūṃ phaṭ!

original: dang po'i rdo rje mthe'u chung dang / mthe bo dag gis 'bar ba bzhi pa'i tshul byas la khro zhing gzhan gyi dpung mngon pa'i phyogs su gtor bar bya ste /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje mthe'u chung dang / mthe bo dag gis 'bar ba bzhi pa'i tshul byas la khro zhing gzhan gyi dpung mngon pa'i phyogs su gtor bar bya ste /
translated: First, with the little finger and the thumb, one should make the blazing gesture of the four fingers, and scatter in the direction of the enemy army, with wrath.

original: phyag rgya gtor ba las rdo rje ro langs la sogs pa spros te /
analyzed: phyag rgya gtor ba las rdo rje ro langs la sogs pa spros te /
translated: From the scattering of the seal, one should imagine that the vajra zombies and so forth are emanated,

original: de rnams kyis gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa'am /🔽ldang ba'am rgyas gdab pa'am ltung ba'am /
analyzed: de rnams kyis gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa'am / ldang ba'am rgyas gdab pa'am ltung ba'am /
translated: and that the enemy army is destroyed by them,🔽or that it is paralyzed, or that it is sealed, or that it falls,

original: gsad par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gsad par bsam par bya ste /
translated: or that it is killed.

original: de ltar na ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa gang yin pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ji lta ba bzhin du bsam pa gang yin pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rims thams cad la sogs pa dang // nad thams cad dang / nad chen po zhi ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: The pacification of all fevers and so forth, and all diseases, and the great diseases, is called the pacification of all diseases.

original: rims thams cad ni sman gyi bstan bcos las ji ltar grags pa'o //
analyzed: rims thams cad ni sman gyi bstan bcos las ji ltar grags pa'o //
translated: All fevers are as they are known in the medical treatises.

original: nad thams cad ni skya rbab la sogs pa'i nad do //
analyzed: nad thams cad ni skya rbab la sogs pa'i nad do //
translated: All diseases are diseases such as dropsy and so forth.

original: nad chen po ni gcod chen po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nad chen po ni gcod chen po la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great diseases are great amputations and so forth.

original: de rnams zhi ba ni 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams zhi ba ni 'jig pa'o //
translated: Their pacification is their destruction.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas 'phrog pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas 'phrog pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because of the great bliss, the vajra is taken away by the gaze.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings te /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the first vajra at one's heart.

original: zhi ba'i lta bas de'i dbus ma rdo rje'i rtse mo 'phrog cing rims nad thams cad la sogs pa 'phrog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba'i lta bas de'i dbus ma rdo rje'i rtse mo 'phrog cing rims nad thams cad la sogs pa 'phrog par byed pa yin no //
translated: With the peaceful gaze, one should take away the tip of the middle vajra, and take away all fevers and so forth.

original: bdag nyid 'phags pa gtsug spyod kyi rang bzhin du bsams la /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'phags pa gtsug spyod kyi rang bzhin du bsams la /
translated: One should imagine oneself in the nature of noble Śikhī.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gtsug spyod kyis kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa gtsug spyod kyis kyang /
translated: And the Blessed Noble Śikhī should also be imagined.

original: nad pa'i spyi bo nas rkang ba'i bar du gang bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: nad pa'i spyi bo nas rkang ba'i bar du gang bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the head and feet of the patient are filled.

original: de ltar na rims thams cad dang nad thams cad dang nad chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rims thams cad dang nad thams cad dang nad chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all fevers, all diseases, and great diseases will be pacified.

original: dug thams cad gzhig par bya ba la ni mi snang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dug thams cad gzhig par bya ba la ni mi snang bar bya'o //
translated: For destroying all poisons, one should become invisible.

original: dug thams cad @194a * //
analyzed: dug thams cad @194a * //
translated: All poisons

original: kyi nus pa 'phrog pa ni dug med par bya ba'o //
analyzed: kyi nus pa 'phrog pa ni dug med par bya ba'o //
translated: are rendered powerless by becoming poisonless.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas 'phrog pas so zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas byams pa'i lta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas 'phrog pas so zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas byams pa'i lta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
translated: Since the great bliss vajra is taken away by the gaze, one should bind the first vajra and take it away with the gaze of love.

original: 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ston par 'gyur te /
translated: It is taught as follows:

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la byams pa'i lta bas blta zhing dang po'i rdo rje dug 'phrog par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la byams pa'i lta bas blta zhing dang po'i rdo rje dug 'phrog par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should gaze with the gaze of love and take away the first vajra.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i sku mdog can gyis kyang dug thams cad bdud rtsir gyur par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i sku mdog can gyis kyang dug thams cad bdud rtsir gyur par bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine that all poisons become nectar through the Blessed One Vajrasattva, who has the color of the moon.

original: de ltar na dug thams cad 'jig pa dang dug med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dug thams cad 'jig pa dang dug med par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all poisons are destroyed and become nonpoisonous.

original: gdon thams cad dgrol bar zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gdon thams cad dgrol bar zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for all grahas are freed,

original: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad ni gdon thams cad de /
analyzed: rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon bco brgyad ni gdon thams cad de /
translated: the eighteen grahas taught in the Vairocana Tantra are all grahas.

original: de rnams bkrol ba ni gdon thams cad bkrol ba ste gdon thams cad kyis bzung ba rnams sel ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams bkrol ba ni gdon thams cad bkrol ba ste gdon thams cad kyis bzung ba rnams sel ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Their being freed is all grahas being freed, that is, the removal of all those seized by grahas.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'byung bo bskrad pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'byung bo bskrad pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the expulsion of the great bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas te dang po'i rdo rje bcings la 'phags pa stobs po che dbu stong dang / phyag stong mnga' bar bdag nyid bsams la des bsgrub bya la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas te dang po'i rdo rje bcings la 'phags pa stobs po che dbu stong dang / phyag stong mnga' bar bdag nyid bsams la des bsgrub bya la dbab par bya'o //
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, having bound the original vajra, one should imagine oneself as the noble Mahabala, with a thousand heads and a thousand arms, and by that one should cause the descent of the one to be subdued.

original: bsgrub bya'i snying ga na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa stobs po ches kyang bsgrub bya kun du gang bar byas nas /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i snying ga na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa stobs po ches kyang bsgrub bya kun du gang bar byas nas /
translated: And the Bhagavat noble Mahabala, residing in the heart of the one to be subdued, should fill the one to be subdued.

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos gdon blangs te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos gdon blangs te /
translated: Then, with the tip of the central prong of the original vajra, one should take up the obstructor.

original: gdon dgrol ba'i bsam pas dang po'i rdo rje zhu nas dgrol bar bya ste /
analyzed: gdon dgrol ba'i bsam pas dang po'i rdo rje zhu nas dgrol bar bya ste /
translated: Having melted the original vajra with the thought of liberating the obstructor, one should liberate it.

original: de ltar na gdon thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gdon thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one will be liberated from all obstructors.

original: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad ni shes par zad do //
analyzed: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad ni shes par zad do //
translated: The mamos, dakinis, and all obstructors are known.

original: de rnams dgrol ba chen po ni bsgrub bya'i lus las shin tu 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams dgrol ba chen po ni bsgrub bya'i lus las shin tu 'jig pa'o //
translated: The great liberation of those is the complete destruction of the body of the one to be liberated.

original: de rnams nyid kyi 'thab pa sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi 'thab pa sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'joms pa'o //
translated: The destruction of those by means of mantra and mudra is the battle of those.

original: de dag nyid kyis sems can gang gi snying bton nas zos pa de las gzhan gyi snying bcug pa ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyis sems can gang gi snying bton nas zos pa de las gzhan gyi snying bcug pa ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: The heart of any sentient being that is extracted and eaten by them is removed, and the heart of another is placed in its stead.

original: de nyid kyis bsad pa'i sems can ni shi ba ste de gso ba ni shi ba gso ba ste slar yang srog byin pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bsad pa'i sems can ni shi ba ste de gso ba ni shi ba gso ba ste slar yang srog byin pa'o //
translated: The sentient being that is killed by them is dead, and the resuscitation of that is the reviving of the dead, the giving of life again.

original: de nyid las srog byin nas @194b sngar sngon gyi bsags pa'i tshe'i bar chod med pa nyid du gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa ni tshe 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid las srog byin nas @194b sngar sngon gyi bsags pa'i tshe'i bar chod med pa nyid du gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug pa ni tshe 'phel ba'o //
translated: The giving of life to that very one, and the uninterrupted increase of the previously accumulated life force is the increase of life.

original: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad kyis de zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ba nyid ni shin tu bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad kyis de zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ba nyid ni shin tu bsrung ba'o //
translated: The fact that one is not overcome by all the mamos, dakinis, and spirits is the great protection.

original: de ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is that done?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so zhes bya ba la /
translated: With the reply of the great bliss vajra seal.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal he ru kar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la dang po'i rdo rjes yongs su bskor te /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal he ru kar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la dang po'i rdo rjes yongs su bskor te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should imagine oneself as glorious Heruka with the previously explained characteristics, completely surrounded by the primordial vajra.

original: mthe bo'i rtse mo dag gis mdzod spu'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: mthe bo'i rtse mo dag gis mdzod spu'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: With the tips of the thumbs, one should hold the place of the ūrṇā.

original: de nas sor mo dbus ma gnyis bskyod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sor mo dbus ma gnyis bskyod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should move the two middle fingers.

original: dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pas bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pas bsgrub bya'i lus la zhugs te /
translated: The glorious Heruka together with the retinue enters the body of the victim.

original: ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad za bar 'gyur bar bsam par byas te de ltar nam mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad za bar 'gyur bar bsam par byas te de ltar nam mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: One should imagine that all the mātṛkās, ḍākinīs, and grahas are being devoured. In this way one becomes free from all the mātṛkās, ḍākinīs, and grahas.

original: 'thab par 'gyur ba de rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo las 'bar ba'i rdo rje rnams spros te de rnams kyi steng du yid kyis dbab par bya ste de ltar na 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'thab par 'gyur ba de rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo las 'bar ba'i rdo rje rnams spros te de rnams kyi steng du yid kyis dbab par bya ste de ltar na 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are to be destroyed by the mantras and seals of those who are to be destroyed, blazing vajras are emanated from the tip of the central vajra, and they are mentally caused to descend upon them; in this way they are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du dbus ma'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas shing dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa snying bton pa'i lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbus ma'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas shing dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa snying bton pa'i lus la bcug ste /
translated: Similarly, the two tips of the central [vajra] are moved, and the glorious Heruka together with his retinue are placed in the body from which the heart has been removed.

original: de'i 'bar ba'i lcags kyu rnams kyis mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon rnams las snying bkug la bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la rab tu bcug par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bar ba'i lcags kyu rnams kyis mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon rnams las snying bkug la bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la rab tu bcug par bya ste /
translated: The blazing hooks of that [Heruka] draw out the hearts of the ḍākinīs and the spirits, and they are placed in the body of the one to be accomplished.

original: de ltar na snying gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na snying gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the heart also arises from another.

original: de bzhin bdag nyid dpal he ru kar rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin bdag nyid dpal he ru kar rnam par bsams la /
translated: Similarly, one should imagine oneself as the glorious Heruka.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo gnyis bskyed cing dpal he ru ka bsgrub bya'i lus la rab tu bcug ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo gnyis bskyed cing dpal he ru ka bsgrub bya'i lus la rab tu bcug ste /
translated: The two tips of the central [vajra] are moved, and the glorious Heruka is placed in the body of the one to be accomplished.

original: bya ba med par 'gyur ba'i bsgrub bya ldang du bcug ste de ltar na 'chi ba gso ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba med par 'gyur ba'i bsgrub bya ldang du bcug ste de ltar na 'chi ba gso ba'o //
translated: Having aroused the object to be accomplished without action, in this way one revives death.

original: de ltar srog byin la che 'phel ba'i bsams bas snying gar dpal rdo rje dpa' bsams zhing de nyid spyi bor yang bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar srog byin la che 'phel ba'i bsams bas snying gar dpal rdo rje dpa' bsams zhing de nyid spyi bor yang bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Thus, having given life, one should imagine glorious Vajraheruka in the heart with the thought of increasing size, and one should imagine that nectar falls on the head.

original: de ltar na tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du dbus ma'i rtse mo bskyod cing bsgrub @195a * //
analyzed: de ltar na tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro // de bzhin du dbus ma'i rtse mo bskyod cing bsgrub @195a * //
translated: In this way, life increases.🔽Similarly, one should move the tip of the central one and imagine the vajra in the heart of the object to be accomplished.

original: bya'i snying gar rdo rje bsam par bya ste de ltar na shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya'i snying gar rdo rje bsam par bya ste de ltar na shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one is well protected.

original: thams cad dbab pa ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad dbab pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad dbab pa ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad dbab pa'o //
translated: “All descend” means that all moving and unmoving beings descend.

original: g-yo ba ni de nyid rang gi gnas nas bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba ni de nyid rang gi gnas nas bskyod pa'o //
translated: “Moving” means that they are moved from their own places.

original: 'chi ba ni de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i lu gu rgyud kyis so //🔽gar ni de nyid gar byed du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu'i lu gu rgyud kyis so // gar ni de nyid gar byed du bcug pa'o //
translated: “Death” means that they are bound by the chain of the vajra hook.🔽“Dance” means that they are made to dance.

original: glu ni glu len du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: glu ni glu len du bcug pa'o //
translated: “Song” means that they are made to sing.

original: sngar ma byung ba so sor ston pa ni de nyid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smrar gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: sngar ma byung ba so sor ston pa ni de nyid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smrar gzhug pa'o //
translated: The teaching of what has not occurred before is to cause one to speak of the past, future, and present.

original: de nyid rmad du byung ba smrar gzhug pa dang de nyid rdzu 'phrul ston du gzhug pa dang / de ni bden pa smrar gzhug pa dang / de nyid bcings pa dgrol ba dang / de nyid byur thams cad phral ba de las bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid rmad du byung ba smrar gzhug pa dang de nyid rdzu 'phrul ston du gzhug pa dang / de ni bden pa smrar gzhug pa dang / de nyid bcings pa dgrol ba dang / de nyid byur thams cad phral ba de las bsrung ba'o //
translated: That is to cause one to speak of the marvelous, to cause one to display miracles, to cause one to speak the truth, to liberate those who are bound, and to protect from all misfortune.

original: sos su gzhug pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad de nyid la rgas pa la sogs pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sos su gzhug pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad de nyid la rgas pa la sogs pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: The restoration of health is the destruction of old age and so forth in the realm of sentient beings.

original: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is all this accomplished?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the descent of the great bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should place the first vajra at the heart center.

original: de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo rang gi snying ga las bstod pas thams cad la dbab pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo rang gi snying ga las bstod pas thams cad la dbab pa ste /
translated: By the tip of the central one, one should cause all to descend from one's heart,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i bsgom pas so //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i bsgom pas so //
translated: by the meditation of the abode of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid kyis rang gi snying bskyod cing dngos po thams cad g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis rang gi snying bskyod cing dngos po thams cad g-yo ba'o //
translated: By that very [mudra], one should cause all things to tremble, by shaking one's heart.

original: de nyid kyis bcing ba'i bsam pas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi pho nyas dngos po thams cad bcing ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bcing ba'i bsam pas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi pho nyas dngos po thams cad bcing ba'o //
translated: By that very [mudra], one should bind all things, by the messenger of the vajra fetters, with the intention of binding.

original: gar byed du gzhug pa'i bsam pa dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyi dngos po thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' bcug nas /
analyzed: gar byed du gzhug pa'i bsam pa dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyi dngos po thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' bcug nas /
translated: By the tip of the central one, one should cause all things to dance, by inserting Vajrasattva into all things.

original: gar byed du bcug pa ste de dag gar byed du bcug pa yin no //
analyzed: gar byed du bcug pa ste de dag gar byed du bcug pa yin no //
translated: Thus, one should cause all things to dance.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyi bsgrub bya'i lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyi bsgrub bya'i lus la bcug ste /
translated: By that very tip of the central one, one should cause the object to sing, by inserting it into the body of the object,

original: glu len du bcug pa'i bsam pas kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste /
analyzed: glu len du bcug pa'i bsam pas kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste /
translated: with the intention of causing it to sing, and drawing it up from the mouth.

original: de ltar na glu len du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na glu len du bcug pa'o //
translated: Thus, one should cause it to sing.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid phan tshun btsir bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid phan tshun btsir bar bya ste /
translated: By that very tip of the central one, one should cause all things to kiss, by pressing them together.

original: de ltar sngar ma byung ba'i so sor bstan pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sngar ma byung ba'i so sor bstan pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one will see the individual teachings that have not occurred before.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid phan tshun kha 'bus pa'i rnam par byas na rmad du byung ba dang / cho 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid phan tshun kha 'bus pa'i rnam par byas na rmad du byung ba dang / cho 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes the tip of the central one mutually facing, one will see the marvelous miracles.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid @195b ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar byas te de ltar na bden pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid @195b ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar byas te de ltar na bden pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa'o //
translated: If one raises the tip of the central one upward from the mouth in the manner of emitting speech, one will cause all truths to be spoken.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid bcings la thams cad dgrol ba'i bsam pas myur du dgrol bar byas te de ltar na thams cad bkrol ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid bcings la thams cad dgrol ba'i bsam pas myur du dgrol bar byas te de ltar na thams cad bkrol ba'o //
translated: If one binds the tip of the central one and quickly unbinds it with the intention of releasing all, one will release all.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid bsrung ba'i bsam pas bskyod par bya ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid bsrung ba'i bsam pas bskyod par bya ste /
translated: If one moves the tip of the central one with the intention of protecting,

original: de ltar na go cha la sogs pa thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na go cha la sogs pa thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: all armor and so forth will be protected.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyis bsgrub bya byab par bya ste de ltar na thams cad sos su bcug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo de nyid kyis bsgrub bya byab par bya ste de ltar na thams cad sos su bcug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one exorcizes the possessed with the tip of the central one, one will cure all.

original: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba la pra dbab pa thams cad ni sngar bshad pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba la pra dbab pa thams cad ni sngar bshad pa ste /
translated: All clairvoyance was previously explained.

original: de rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: How are they accomplished?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje pra dbab pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje pra dbab pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the clairvoyance of the great-bliss vajra.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas te khye'u'am bu mo dang po'i rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas te khye'u'am bu mo dang po'i rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, bless the boy or girl as the original Vajrasattva.

original: de'i rna ba dang mig gnyis la yi ge h'um las rdo rje rnam par bsams la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: de'i rna ba dang mig gnyis la yi ge h'um las rdo rje rnam par bsams la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes brjod cing /
translated: Visualize a vajra from the syllable hum in both their ears and eyes, and recite anurāgya mi hum.

original: sbyin sreg gi thal bas me long yang dag par sbyangs la nye 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs dri bzang pos byug par byas nas me tog bkram pas nye bar mdzes par byas la der me long bzhag ste de la bcom ldan 'das sbrul te /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi thal bas me long yang dag par sbyangs la nye 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs dri bzang pos byug par byas nas me tog bkram pas nye bar mdzes par byas la der me long bzhag ste de la bcom ldan 'das sbrul te /
translated: Cleanse a mirror with the ashes of a burnt offering, anoint the surrounding area with saffron, and beautify it with scattered flowers. Place the mirror there and the Bhagavān will emanate there.

original: 'dus byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas te sgo phye nas spyan drangs ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis sprul pa la bcug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas te sgo phye nas spyan drangs ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags dag gis sprul pa la bcug par bya'o //
translated: Having praised with the one hundred and eight names, one should open the door and invite with the mantra and the mudrā of summoning.

original: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de aa ka ru phul la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de aa ka ru phul la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Then, having performed the expulsion of obstacles with the vajra-yakṣa, and so on, one should block the door with the vajra-fist, offer the agaru, and accomplish with the pledge mudrā.

original: de nas chos dang las dang / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: Then, having sealed the Bhagavān with the Dharma, karma, and great mudrās, and so on, one should confer empowerment with the empowerment mudrā.

original: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Having made perfect offerings with the five offerings, one should also make perfect offerings with the mudrā offerings of the twelve aspects.

original: phyag byas nas bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: phyag byas nas bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: Having made obeisance, one should recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas slar yang yang @196a * //
analyzed: de nas slar yang yang @196a * //
translated: Then, again,

original: dag par mchod de /
analyzed: dag par mchod de /
translated: make perfect offerings.

original: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bden pa gang gis /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bden pa gang gis /
translated: O Bhagavat Vajrasattva, by whatever truth🔽all phenomena are like reflections, by that truth show me the desired object.

original: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i bden pa des bdag la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ston cig ces bya ba dang / bden pa gang gis sgra rnams brag ca dang 'dra ba'i bden pa des /
analyzed: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i bden pa des bdag la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po ston cig ces bya ba dang / bden pa gang gis sgra rnams brag ca dang 'dra ba'i bden pa des /
translated: And, By whatever truth all sounds are like echoes, by that truth🔽speak the desired object.

original: bdag la mngon par 'dod pa gsungs shig ces bya ba'i bden pa'i byin rlabs byas nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings te rang gi snying gar bzhag nas dbus ma'i kha sbyor bskyod cing bzla bar bya ste /
analyzed: bdag la mngon par 'dod pa gsungs shig ces bya ba'i bden pa'i byin rlabs byas nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings te rang gi snying gar bzhag nas dbus ma'i kha sbyor bskyod cing bzla bar bya ste /
translated: Having made the consecration of truth in this way, one should bind the first vajra, place it on one's heart, move the middle one, and recite.

original: de ltar na khye'u dang bu mo dag gis thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na khye'u dang bu mo dag gis thams cad mthong ba dang thos pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the boy and girl will see and hear everything.

original: de ltar na pra dbab pa gzhan rnams kyi sgrub pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na pra dbab pa gzhan rnams kyi sgrub pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should understand the practice of the other types of clairvoyance.

original: rang gi lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lus dang yid dag ni rang gi lus dang yid rnams so //
analyzed: rang gi lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lus dang yid dag ni rang gi lus dang yid rnams so //
translated: One's own body and so forth refers to one's own body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag nyid rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rtog pa med cing mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid rtse gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rtog pa med cing mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste rdo rje'o //
translated: Those very [vajras] are the vajra-like, non-conceptual, and indivisible yoga of one-pointedness.

original: de rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang / ston pa'i shes pa rnams grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang / ston pa'i shes pa rnams grub pa ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The perfection of the knowledge of seeing, hearing, speaking, and teaching everything just as it is by those [vajras] is the perfection.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba la de yang 'di yin te de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje ni rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bcings te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba la de yang 'di yin te de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje ni rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bcings te /
translated: By meditating on the nature of the great bliss vajra. That is as follows: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the original vajra in one's heart region.

original: des nyin rer lus la sbyangs pas lus 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: des nyin rer lus la sbyangs pas lus 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: By training the body with that every day, the body will be accomplished.

original: de nyid ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na ngag grub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na ngag grub pa'o //
translated: By the method of emitting that [vajra] from the mouth, it should be drawn upward. In that way, the speech will be accomplished.

original: de nyid snying gar bzhag la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms te de ltar na sems grub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid snying gar bzhag la rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgoms te de ltar na sems grub pa'o //
translated: Having placed it on one’s heart, one should visualize the hero-vajra in one’s heart. In this way, the mind is accomplished.

original: de nyid la blta zhing bzlas par byas te /
analyzed: de nyid la blta zhing bzlas par byas te /
translated: Looking at it, one should recite.

original: de ltar na thams cad mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na thams cad mthong ba yin no //
translated: In this way, one sees everything.

original: de nyid rna ba la gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid rna ba la gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Having placed it on one’s ear,

original: de ltar na rna ba'i shes pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rna ba'i shes pa grub pa'o //
translated: in this way, the consciousness of the ear is accomplished.

original: de nyid kha la bzhag nas bzlas par bya ste de ltar na lces thams cad smra ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kha la bzhag nas bzlas par bya ste de ltar na lces thams cad smra ba yin no //
translated: Having placed it in one’s mouth, one should recite. In this way, with the tongue, one speaks everything.

original: de nyid chos bstan pa'i bsam pas khar bzung zhing blta bar byas nas thams cad ston pa'i shes pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid chos bstan pa'i bsam pas khar bzung zhing blta bar byas nas thams cad ston pa'i shes pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having held it in one’s mouth with the intention of teaching the Dharma, and having looked at it, the knowledge of teaching everything is accomplished.

original: thams cad las 'das pa dang ma @196b 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po thams cad dang / nam mkha'i phyogs las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de la /🔽bka' shes pa smra ba pa de /
analyzed: thams cad las 'das pa dang ma @196b 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dngos po thams cad dang / nam mkha'i phyogs las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de la / bka' shes pa smra ba pa de /
translated: All things, past, future, and present, etc.

original: yi ge aa la sogs pa ste /🔽de nyid sna tshogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: yi ge aa la sogs pa ste / de nyid sna tshogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: All things, past, future, and present, etc.🔽 All things, past, future, and present, etc.🔽 All things, past, future, and present, etc.

original: yang na dngos po thams cad ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin rnams kyis rna ba'i shes pa 'jug pa ni ma 'khrul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa de nyid sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na dngos po thams cad ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin rnams kyis rna ba'i shes pa 'jug pa ni ma 'khrul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa de nyid sgrub pa yin no //
translated: All things, past, future, and present, etc.🔽 All

original: de phyag rgya gang gis rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de phyag rgya gang gis rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: By which gesture is it perfected?

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: By the great bliss vajra omniscience.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Great bliss is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i thams cad mkhyen pa ni dus gsum gyi dngos po 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i thams cad mkhyen pa ni dus gsum gyi dngos po 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: His omniscience is the consciousness that apprehends the entities of the three times, etc.

original: de rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: de rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The gesture that perfects that is the great bliss vajra omniscience.

original: des de thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des de thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one attains that.

original: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o //
translated: It is explained in this way: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva as taught in the secret mandala, one should bind the original vajra and perform the consecration of the truth.

original: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bskor zhing phyag rgya des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs mthong ba'i bsam pas nyin re zhing lan cig mig tu bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar byas na thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' bskor zhing phyag rgya des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs mthong ba'i bsam pas nyin re zhing lan cig mig tu bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar byas na thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one should visualize oneself as Vajrasattva, and with that seal, one should place it on the eye, and turn it once a day, thinking to see the past, future, and present forms.

original: rna bar bzhag nas bskor ba byas na thams cad thos pa dang / snar bzhag nas snom pa dang / lcer bzhag nas thams cad smra ba dang / lus la bzhag nas thams cad la reg pa dang / snying gar bzhag nas thams cad du bskor bar byas na de ltar yid kyis thams cad shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rna bar bzhag nas bskor ba byas na thams cad thos pa dang / snar bzhag nas snom pa dang / lcer bzhag nas thams cad smra ba dang / lus la bzhag nas thams cad la reg pa dang / snying gar bzhag nas thams cad du bskor bar byas na de ltar yid kyis thams cad shes pa yin no //
translated: If one places it on the ear and turns it, one will hear all. If one places it on the nose and smells, and places it on the tongue and speaks all, and places it on the body and touches all, and places it on the heart and turns it, one will know all mentally.

original: glog dang char dang thog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: glog dang char dang thog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: All lightning, rain, and hail will be averted, and the clouds will be destroyed.

original: ji ltar zhe na bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so zhes bya @197a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so zhes bya @197a * //
translated: How? With the view of the great bliss vajra wrath.

original: ba la / bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba ni /
analyzed: ba la / bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba ni /
translated: The view of the great-bliss-vajra-anger

original: khros pas blta ba ste de dang bcas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgyas bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba ste des de 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: khros pas blta ba ste de dang bcas pa'i dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgyas bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba ste des de 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: is the view with anger. With that, the view of the great-bliss-vajra-anger is by the mudra of the first vajra. By that, it is accomplished.

original: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje dang khro bo'i lta bas bltas zhing glog bzlog pa'i tshul gyis glog bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje dang khro bo'i lta bas bltas zhing glog bzlog pa'i tshul gyis glog bzlog par bya'o //
translated: It is explained as follows: As before, in the yoga of Vajrasattva, bind the first vajra, and with the vajra in the middle of that and the view of anger, view with the view of anger, and with the method of averting lightning, avert lightning.

original: char bzlog pa'i tshul gyis char bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: char bzlog pa'i tshul gyis char bzlog par bya'o //
translated: With the method of averting rain, avert rain.

original: thog 'bab pa bzlog pa'i tshul gyis thog bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: thog 'bab pa bzlog pa'i tshul gyis thog bzlog par bya'o //
translated: With the method of averting hail, avert hail.

original: sprin gzhig pa'i tshul gyis sprin gzhig par bya'o //
analyzed: sprin gzhig pa'i tshul gyis sprin gzhig par bya'o //
translated: With the method of destroying clouds, destroy clouds.

original: sa'i 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sa'i 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: All the grains and so on that have not previously appeared from the earth, and so on.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te dbus ma'i rdo rje 'di rnams bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te dbus ma'i rdo rje 'di rnams bya ste /
translated: Likewise, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the first vajra and imagine that all the fruits such as grain, etc.

original: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sbyor bas sa'i 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba'i bsam pas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sbyor bas sa'i 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba'i bsam pas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu bskyed par bya'o //
translated: that have not arisen previously arise from below the earth by the method that will be explained below, and one should generate the fruit that has not arisen previously.

original: de nye bar len pa ni thams cad las dgug cing nye bar blangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nye bar len pa ni thams cad las dgug cing nye bar blangs pa'o //
translated: Taking that up is summoning and taking it up from everywhere.

original: chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i phung po 'byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i phung po 'byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: The arising of a mass of water from a place that has no water is generating.

original: de nyid sbyin pa'i tshul gyis nye bar blang ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid sbyin pa'i tshul gyis nye bar blang ba'o //
translated: That itself is taking up by the method of giving.

original: 'bar ba dang me stag 'phro bas mun par snang ba chen po bskyed pa ste snang ba chen po sbyor ba'i tshul gyis snang ba chen po nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba dang me stag 'phro bas mun par snang ba chen po bskyed pa ste snang ba chen po sbyor ba'i tshul gyis snang ba chen po nye bar len pa'o //
translated: The generation of a great light in the darkness by blazing and the scattering of sparks is taking up the great light by the method of the application of great light.

original: rlung gi tshul gyis rlung thams cad bka' bsgo ba ste rlung thams cad nye bar blang pa'i tshul gyis de nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi tshul gyis rlung thams cad bka' bsgo ba ste rlung thams cad nye bar blang pa'i tshul gyis de nye bar len pa'o //
translated: By the method of wind, all winds are commanded, and by the method of taking up all winds, they are taken up.

original: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i nam mkha' thams cad las dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i bsgom pas dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i nam mkha' thams cad las dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i bsgom pas dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o //
translated: By the meditation of seeing all things from all space in the ten directions, all things are seen.

original: dngos po thams cad nye bar len pa'i bsgoms pas dngos po thams cad nye bar blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad nye bar len pa'i bsgoms pas dngos po thams cad nye bar blang bar bya ste /
translated: By the meditation of taking up all things, all things are taken up.

original: 'di ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yin no //
translated: This is the great bliss of Vajradhatviśvarī.

original: thams cad gzhom pa dang / rengs pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gsad pa dang / @197b phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: thams cad gzhom pa dang / rengs pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gsad pa dang / @197b phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni bshad zin to //
translated: All destruction, immobilization, splitting, stupefying, putting to sleep, sealing, falling, confusing, killing, and reversing have been explained.

original: 'di rnams ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di rnams ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How do these occur?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje gdug pa'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gdug pa'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The great bliss vajra hook gesture accomplishes those actions.

original: bde ba chen po gdug pa ni drag po'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po gdug pa ni drag po'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The great bliss vajra hook is Vajrasattva in a wrathful form.

original: de'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i ba dan gyis las de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i ba dan gyis las de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the banner of his vajra hook gesture, those actions are accomplished.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This teaches the following.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva, form the original vajra.

original: bdag nyid drag po chen po'i gzugs can gyis rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: bdag nyid drag po chen po'i gzugs can gyis rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsams la /
translated: Visualize yourself in the form of Great Wrathful Vajrasattva.

original: dang po'i rdo rjes dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rjes dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las rnams bya'o //
translated: With the original vajra, perform the central vajra actions.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje bsnun pas thams cad 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje bsnun pas thams cad 'joms pa'o //
translated: By striking with the central vajra, all are destroyed.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo gnyis snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bas btsir na /🔽thams cad rengs pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo gnyis snying ga'i phyogs su btsir bas btsir na / thams cad rengs pa'o //
translated: By pressing the two tips of the central vajra to the heart region, all are paralyzed.

original: dbus ma'i rtse mo rdo rje sen mo dag dral bas na thams cad dral ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtse mo rdo rje sen mo dag dral bas na thams cad dral ba'o //
translated: By scratching with the tips of the central vajra nails, all are scratched.

original: dbus ma rdo rjes rang gi mig la reg pas thams cad rmugs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma rdo rjes rang gi mig la reg pas thams cad rmugs par byed pa'o //
translated: The central vajra touches one’s eye, and all become stupefied.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes rang gi mig btsums par byas na thams cad gnyid log tu bcug pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes rang gi mig btsums par byas na thams cad gnyid log tu bcug pa'o //
translated: The central vajra closes one’s eyes, and all fall asleep.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo bcu gnyis phan tshun snyom par yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo bcu gnyis phan tshun snyom par yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The central vajra should be formed with the twelve fingers crossed with one another.

original: des rang gi snying gar man par byas na rgyas btab ba'o //
analyzed: des rang gi snying gar man par byas na rgyas btab ba'o //
translated: Placing it on one’s heart, one paralyzes.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes ltung ba'i tshul du byas na thams cad ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes ltung ba'i tshul du byas na thams cad ltung ba'o //
translated: The central vajra is formed in the manner of falling, and all fall.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes glod par byas na rmongs par byed ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes glod par byas na rmongs par byed ba'o //
translated: The central vajra is formed in the manner of relaxing, and one causes confusion.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes phan tshun du brdeg pas gsod pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes phan tshun du brdeg pas gsod pa'o //
translated: The central vajra is formed in the manner of striking one another, and one kills.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i dngos po nyid rang gi snying gar gzung bar byas na phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i dngos po nyid rang gi snying gar gzung bar byas na phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: The central vajra is formed in the manner of holding to one’s heart, and one repels.

original: thams cad rjes su chas pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgrol pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba slong ba dang / 'dren ba dang ; bran du byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bsgo bar byed ba dang /
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chas pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgrol pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba slong ba dang / 'dren ba dang ; bran du byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bsgo bar byed ba dang /
translated: All activities are performed, such as summoning, inducting, bringing down, binding, releasing, separating, causing to fall, causing to rise, causing to be a servant, and causing to be an attendant.🔽All activities are performed, such as summoning, inducting, bringing down, binding, releasing, separating, causing to fall, causing to rise, causing to be a servant, and causing to be an attendant.

original: thams cad tshur drang ba dang / phar gtong ba dang / gsad pa dang / slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang // dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad grub @198a * //🔽pas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad tshur drang ba dang / phar gtong ba dang / gsad pa dang / slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang // dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad grub @198a * // pas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The accomplishment of magnetizing is the accomplishment of all great bliss vajras.

original: de bzhin du dpal rdo rjes sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje de rnams bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dpal rdo rjes sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje de rnams bya ba yin te /
translated: Thus, having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, the activity of the central vajra of the first vajra is all activities,

original: mda' gtod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad rjes su chags pa'o //
analyzed: mda' gtod pa'i tshul gyis thams cad rjes su chags pa'o //
translated: such as summoning, inducting, bringing down, binding, releasing, separating, causing to fall, causing to rise, causing to be a servant, and causing to be an attendant.

original: dbus ma gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis bya ste des bsgrub bya bkug pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dug pa'o //🔽g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i rdo rje las g-yas pa'i dbus ma'i sor mo bcug pas thams cad gzhag pa'o //🔽dbus ma'i rdo rje'i rtse mo bskyod pas dbab pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis bya ste des bsgrub bya bkug pa'i tshul gyis thams cad dug pa'o // g-yon pa'i dbus ma'i rdo rje las g-yas pa'i dbus ma'i sor mo bcug pas thams cad gzhag pa'o // dbus ma'i rdo rje'i rtse mo bskyod pas dbab pa'o //
translated: The two middle fingers of both hands form two hooks, and by the method of drawing in the victim, all are drawn in.🔽By inserting the right middle finger into the left middle vajra, all are placed.🔽By shaking the tip of the middle vajra, all are brought down.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje gdu bu bcings pas bcing ba'o //🔽dbus ma'i rdo rje myur du bkrol pas bkrol ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje gdu bu bcings pas bcing ba'o // dbus ma'i rdo rje myur du bkrol pas bkrol ba'o //
translated: By binding the middle vajra with a bracelet, all are bound.🔽By quickly releasing the middle vajra, all are released.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo gnyis mnyam por byas la myur du dral bas na dral ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo gnyis mnyam por byas la myur du dral bas na dral ba'o //
translated: By quickly separating the two middle vajra fingers, all are separated.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje ltung bar byas pas na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje ltung bar byas pas na ltung ba'o //
translated: By lowering the middle vajra, all are lowered.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og nas steng du drangs pas ltung ba bslang bar bya'o ;
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og nas steng du drangs pas ltung ba bslang bar bya'o ;
translated: By drawing the middle vajra up from below, all are raised.

original: / dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo g-yon pa g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus mas drangs pas na 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: / dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo g-yon pa g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus mas drangs pas na 'dren pa'o //
translated: By drawing the left middle vajra finger with the right middle vajra finger, all are drawn.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad sbyor bar byed pas na bran du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad sbyor bar byed pas na bran du byed pa'o //
translated: Since the central vajra causes all the others to unite, it is the servant.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes 'og tu bskyod bcing steng du dor bas mngag gzhug bka' bsgo bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes 'og tu bskyod bcing steng du dor bas mngag gzhug bka' bsgo bar byed pa'o //
translated: Since the central vajra moves below, binds above, and throws upward, it is the messenger who obeys the command.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje tshur drangs pas tshur 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje tshur drangs pas tshur 'dren pa'o //
translated: Since the central vajra is drawn in, it is the summoner.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su khyer nas gzhag pas phar gtang ba'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su khyer nas gzhag pas phar gtang ba'o //
translated: Since the central vajra carries and places the object of desire in its place, it is the sender.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i g-yon pa dang g-yas ba drag tu brdegs pas gsad pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i g-yon pa dang g-yas ba drag tu brdegs pas gsad pa'o //
translated: Since the central vajra strikes violently to the left and right, it is the killer.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje rang gi snying ga la gnas pa'i rtse mo gyen du drangs pas slar gso ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje rang gi snying ga la gnas pa'i rtse mo gyen du drangs pas slar gso ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since the central vajra, located at the heart, draws up the tip upward, it is the reviver.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad sbyor bar byed pas las thams cad byed pa dang dbang du byed pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad sbyor bar byed pas las thams cad byed pa dang dbang du byed pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the central vajra causes all the others to unite, it is the agent of all actions and the one who accomplishes the subjugation.

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to all, etc.,

original: rigs thams ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
analyzed: rigs thams ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
translated: All families are the maṇḍalas of the mundane and supramundane families.

original: de dag gi mchog gi dngos grub ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin ba la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mchog gi dngos grub ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin ba la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The supreme attainment is the perfection of the stages, perfections, and so forth.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi mchog gi dngos grub @198b thams cad kyi dang por gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi mchog gi dngos grub @198b thams cad kyi dang por gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That itself is the supreme attainment, which has the characteristic of buddhahood and Vajradharahood, and is the first of all, and is so called.

original: mchog gi dngos grub thams cad ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgya srid kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub thams cad ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgya srid kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The supreme attainment is the consecration of the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms.

original: de nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi thog mar gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi thog mar gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That itself is the first of all the mundane and supramundane perfections, and is so called.

original: thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu zhugs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu zhugs pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The complete engagement of all the bliss and mental joy of passion and so forth is the perfection in one’s own and others’ continuums.

original: mchod pa chen po thams cad ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug ste /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po thams cad ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dang / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug ste /
translated: All the great offerings are the twelve offerings beginning with Vajra Weapon, and the sixteen offerings taught in the Action Tantra.

original: de dag las thams cad kyi sgrub pa myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dang por gang las yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag las thams cad kyi sgrub pa myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dang por gang las yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The extensive ritual for quickly accomplishing all of them is the first of those, and so it is called that.

original: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na //
translated: How is that?

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: It is explained as follows: by the supreme attainment of great bliss.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te snying ga'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te snying ga'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste /
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should bind the original vajra and, in the manner of emanating a mandala, circle it in the region of the heart.

original: rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will attain all the supreme attainments, such as the supreme attainment of all the families.

original: dang po rdo rje de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul byas la /
analyzed: dang po rdo rje de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs 'ching ba'i tshul byas la /
translated: First, with that very vajra, one should make the gesture of tying the garland of consecration and the hanging ribbons.

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will obtain all the perfections, such as the consecration and so forth.

original: dang po'i rdo rje snying ga'i phyogs nas bteg ste /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje snying ga'i phyogs nas bteg ste /
translated: One should raise the original vajra from the heart region,

original: bde ba dang yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas de nyid kyis bdag nyid la bde bar yongs su spyang ba bya ste /
analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas de nyid kyis bdag nyid la bde bar yongs su spyang ba bya ste /
translated: and with the thought of experiencing bliss and mental bliss, one should purify oneself with that very [vajra].

original: thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will enter into all the bliss and mental bliss, such as the passion of all.

original: dang po'i rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis slang ste spyi bor bkrol bar byas nas mchod pa thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi sgrub pa myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis slang ste spyi bor bkrol bar byas nas mchod pa thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi sgrub pa myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Having raised the original vajra with the manner of dance, one should release it above the head. One will accomplish the extensive ritual of quickly accomplishing all activities, such as all offerings and so forth.

original: de la 'di zhes bya ba la rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyud thugs la ngas pa gsungs te de la @199a * //
analyzed: de la 'di zhes bya ba la rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi rgyud thugs la ngas pa gsungs te de la @199a * //
translated: The seal-characterized tantra called this was taught by me, the Buddha, who has realized it in my mind.

original: 'di'i rgyud ces bya ba dang sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyud ces bya ba dang sbyor ro //
translated: This is connected with the phrase this tantra.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The pledge of the secret mandala of the great-bliss vajra is the secret mandala.

original: de'i dang po mchog ni phul du byung ba'i dam tshig gi rang bzhin can gyi las grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dang po mchog ni dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
analyzed: de'i dang po mchog ni phul du byung ba'i dam tshig gi rang bzhin can gyi las grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dang po mchog ni dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
translated: The pledge of the great-bliss vajra's first supreme is the pledge action seal, which is the nature of the supreme pledge and accomplishes the activities.

original: de ston par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i tshogs ni rgyud de 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las brgya rtsa brgyad sgrub par byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje tshe la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'di
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i sgrub pa'i tshogs ni rgyud de 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las brgya rtsa brgyad sgrub par byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje tshe la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'di
translated: The tantra that teaches the collection of means of achievement of those is the tantra that was just explained, the Vajrasattva's Secret Mandala Tantra, which teaches the characteristics of the great-bliss vajra's life-empowerment and so forth, the action seals that accomplish the one hundred and eight activities.

original: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is yes.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje dang po'i rdo rje ste de sgrub pa po la rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba yin no //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje dang po'i rdo rje ste de sgrub pa po la rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba yin no //
translated: The great bliss is the first vajra, and that is the giver of the life of Vajrasattva to the practitioner.

original: 'dir las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dir las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here, all karma-mudras should be embraced means

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bde ba chen po rdo rje tshe la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te bde ba chen po rdo rje tshe la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don to //
translated: that, having bound the first vajra, one should embrace the great bliss vajra life-mudra, and so forth.🔽The meaning is as stated.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should drink from the middle vajra means
