original: mgrin pa gsal ba'i dag ces bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na dag grub pa'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa gsal ba'i dag ces bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na dag grub pa'o //
translated: The “purification of the throat” is the first vajra, which is drawn up from the mouth in the manner of emitting, and in this way, the purification is accomplished.

original: snying gar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag na yid grub pa'o //
analyzed: snying gar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag na yid grub pa'o //
translated: “Placing it in the heart” is placing that very [vajra] in the region of one’s heart, and in this way, the mind is accomplished.

original: phyag rgya la lta ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje la blta zhing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na thams cad mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya la lta ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje la blta zhing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na thams cad mthong ba yin no //
translated: “Looking at the seal” is looking at the first vajra and doing the repetition, and in this way, everything is seen.

original: de nyid rna bar gzhag par bya ste de ltar na rna ba'i shes pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rna bar gzhag par bya ste de ltar na rna ba'i shes pa grub pa'o //
translated: That very [vajra] is placed in the ear, and in this way, the ear consciousness is accomplished.

original: de nyid kha la bzhag cing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na thams cad smra ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kha la bzhag cing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na thams cad smra ba yin no //
translated: That very [vajra] is placed in the mouth and one does the repetition, and in this way, everything is spoken.

original: de nyid chos ston pa'i bsam pas blta zhing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na chos thams cad ston pa'i shes pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid chos ston pa'i bsam pas blta zhing bzlas pa bya ste de ltar na chos thams cad ston pa'i shes pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Looking with the intention of teaching the Dharma, one should recite; in this way, the knowledge of teaching all Dharmas is accomplished.

original: nyin rer snga dro lan cig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no /
analyzed: nyin rer snga dro lan cig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no /
translated: “Every morning, once” is as before.

original: dbang po thams cad la bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dbang po thams cad la bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Placing it on all the sense organs, one should turn it in all directions” means

original: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mig la bzhag ste nyin rer snga dro lan cig tu dngos po thams cad la blta ba'i bsam pas thams cad du bskor bar bya ste de ltar thams cad mthong ba'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mig la bzhag ste nyin rer snga dro lan cig tu dngos po thams cad la blta ba'i bsam pas thams cad du bskor bar bya ste de ltar thams cad mthong ba'o //
translated: that one should bind the original vajra, place it on the eyes, and, with the intention of looking at all things, turn it in all directions once every morning; in this way, one sees everything.

original: sgra thams cad nyan pa'i bsam pas rna bar bzhag la thams cad du bskor bar byas te /
analyzed: sgra thams cad nyan pa'i bsam pas rna bar bzhag la thams cad du bskor bar byas te /
translated: With the intention of hearing all sounds, one should place it on the ears and turn it in all directions;

original: thams cad thos pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad thos pa'o //
translated: in this way, one hears everything.

original: dri thams cad la snom pa'i bsam pas snas thams cad snom pa'o //
analyzed: dri thams cad la snom pa'i bsam pas snas thams cad snom pa'o //
translated: With the intention of smelling all smells, one should smell everything with the nose;

original: thams cad smra ba'i bsam pas lces thams cad smra ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad smra ba'i bsam pas lces thams cad smra ba yin no //
translated: with the intention of speaking to everyone, one should speak to everyone with the tongue.

original: reg bya thams cad nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas lus la bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: reg bya thams cad nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas lus la bzhag ste thams cad du bskor bar bya ste /
translated: Having placed it on the body with the thought of experiencing all textures, one should rotate it everywhere.

original: de ltar na lus kyis thams cad la reg pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na lus kyis thams cad la reg pa'o //
translated: In this way, one touches everything with the body.

original: snying gar bzhag nas thams cad du bskor bar byas te de ltar na yid kyis thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying gar bzhag nas thams cad du bskor bar byas te de ltar na yid kyis thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having placed it at the heart, one should rotate it everywhere. In this way, one knows everything with the mind.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rjes byed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rjes byed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The middle vajra is the agent of the action.

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i glog bzlog pa la sogs pa'i las kyi tshul ni byed pa'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i glog bzlog pa la sogs pa'i las kyi tshul ni byed pa'o //
translated: The method of the action of the middle vajra of the first vajra, such as averting lightning, is the agent.

original: khro bo'i rdo rje blta bas so zhes bya ba la khro bo'i lta ba dang bcas pas so //
analyzed: khro bo'i rdo rje blta bas so zhes bya ba la khro bo'i lta ba dang bcas pas so //
translated: By the gaze of the wrathful vajra.

original: 'di ltar 'chang par 'gyur te dang po'i rdo rje bcings la khro bo'i lta pas blta zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chang par 'gyur te dang po'i rdo rje bcings la khro bo'i lta pas blta zhing /
translated: One should hold it thus: Having bound the first vajra, one should gaze with the gaze of the wrathful one.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje glog @201b bzlog pa'i tshul gyis bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje glog @201b bzlog pa'i tshul gyis bzlog par bya'o //
translated: One should avert the middle vajra with the method of averting lightning.

original: char bzlog pa'i tshul gyis char bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: char bzlog pa'i tshul gyis char bzlog par bya'o //
translated: One should avert rain with the method of averting rain.

original: thog 'bab pa bzlog pa'i tshul gyis thog 'bab pa bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: thog 'bab pa bzlog pa'i tshul gyis thog 'bab pa bzlog par bya'o //
translated: One should avert lightning by the method of averting lightning.

original: sprin gzhig pa'i bsam pas sprin gzhig bar bya'o //
analyzed: sprin gzhig pa'i bsam pas sprin gzhig bar bya'o //
translated: One should destroy clouds by the intention of destroying clouds.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo'i las ni dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las te sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu bskyed pa la sogs pa'i las so //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo'i las ni dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las te sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu bskyed pa la sogs pa'i las so //
translated: The action of the central vajra is the action of the central point of the first vajra, which is the action of the central vajra, the action of generating a result that has not occurred before, and so on.

original: 'og nas 'byung ste zhes bya ba la /🔽dang po'i rdo rje bcings te de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du byas te de ltar na thams cad kyi 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'og nas 'byung ste zhes bya ba la / dang po'i rdo rje bcings te de'i dbus ma'i rtse mo 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du byas te de ltar na thams cad kyi 'og nas sngar ma byung ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said to occur below.🔽Binding the first vajra, one should make the central point of that vajra in the manner that will be described below. In that way, all results that have not occurred before will occur below.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'i tshul du bya ste 'bras bu thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'i tshul du bya ste 'bras bu thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'o //
translated: The enjoyment is the central point of the first vajra, which should be made in the manner of enjoying the result. It is the enjoyment of all results.

original: thams cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thams cad 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one called attracting all is as follows:

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos ri bo la sogs pa'i phyogs la klu dgug pa'i tshul du byas te de bkug pas ri bo la sogs pa chu med pa'i phyogs su 'bab chu la sogs pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos ri bo la sogs pa'i phyogs la klu dgug pa'i tshul du byas te de bkug pas ri bo la sogs pa chu med pa'i phyogs su 'bab chu la sogs pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: With the tip of the central vajra of the first [stage], one should do it in the manner of summoning the nāgas in the direction of a mountain, and so on. By summoning them, a river, and so on, will appear in a place without water, such as a mountain.

original: dbab pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dbab pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one called giving descent is as follows:

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos chu 'bab pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ste de ltar na chu'i phung po nye bar len par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos chu 'bab pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ste de ltar na chu'i phung po nye bar len par 'gyur ro //
translated: With the tip of the central vajra of the first [stage], one should do it in the manner of giving the descent of water. In that way, a mass of water will be appropriated.

original: 'bar ba'i me tog byed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'bar ba'i me tog byed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one called making a blazing flower is as follows:

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos 'bar ba'i me tog gi tshul bya ste /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos 'bar ba'i me tog gi tshul bya ste /
translated: With the tip of the central vajra of the first [stage], one should do it in the manner of a blazing flower.

original: de ltar mun pa snang ba chen por bskyed pa yin no //🔽nye bar len pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ltar mun pa snang ba chen por bskyed pa yin no // nye bar len pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: In that way, darkness will be generated as great light.🔽The one called appropriating is as follows:

original: nye bar len pa ni nges par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni nges par sbyar ba'o //
translated: Appropriating means definitely applying.

original: de yang dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo byas te de ltar na snang ba chen po nye bar len pa'o //🔽rlung gi tshul zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rlung gi tshul bya ste de ltar na rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo byas te de ltar na snang ba chen po nye bar len pa'o // rlung gi tshul zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rlung gi tshul bya ste de ltar na rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The great appearance is appropriated by the tip of the central prong of the first vajra.🔽 The manner of the wind is the manner of the wind by the tip of the central prong of the first vajra. In this way, all winds will listen to one's command.

original: nye bar len pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rlung thams cad nye bar spyor ba'i tshul bya ste de ltar na rlung thams cad nye bar len par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rlung thams cad nye bar spyor ba'i tshul bya ste de ltar na rlung thams cad nye bar len par 'gyur ro //
translated: The appropriation is the manner of appropriating all winds by the tip of the central prong of the first vajra. In this way, all winds will be appropriated.

original: nam mkha' thams cad bsgom pa las du ma'o zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos phyogs bcur gnas pa'i nam @202a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad bsgom pa las du ma'o zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos phyogs bcur gnas pa'i nam @202a * //
translated: The many from the meditation on all space is by the tip of the central prong of the first vajra.

original: mkha' las dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i tshul byas na dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i bsgom pas dngos po thams cad mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: mkha' las dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i tshul byas na dngos po thams cad mthong ba'i bsgom pas dngos po thams cad mthong ba yin no //
translated: The manner of seeing all things from the space abiding in the ten directions is the meditation of seeing all things. In this way, all things are seen.

original: dngos po thams cad nye bar sbyor ba'i tshul dang / sgom pa dag gis dngos po thams cad nye bar len par 'gyur ba yin no ;
analyzed: dngos po thams cad nye bar sbyor ba'i tshul dang / sgom pa dag gis dngos po thams cad nye bar len par 'gyur ba yin no ;
translated: By the method of applying all things and by the meditation, all things are appropriated.

original: / dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo las ni dbus ma'i rdo rje las te thams cad gzhom pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mo las ni dbus ma'i rdo rje las te thams cad gzhom pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The activity of the central vajra means that from the tip of the central vajra of the first vajra, all things are conquered, and so forth.

original: phyag rgya gzhom pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos thams cad 'joms pa'i bsam pas gzhom pas na thams cad 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya gzhom pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos thams cad 'joms pa'i bsam pas gzhom pas na thams cad 'joms pa'o //
translated: Conquering the seal means that by conquering with the thought of conquering all things with the tip of the central vajra of the first vajra, all things are conquered.

original: rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rtse mo snying ga'i phyogs su bcir na thams cad rengs pa'o //
analyzed: rtse mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rtse mo snying ga'i phyogs su bcir na thams cad rengs pa'o //
translated: Pressing the two tips at the heart means that if one presses the tips of the first vajra toward the heart, all things are paralyzed.

original: sen mo dag brud ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus mas rdo rje'i sen mo gnyis brud pas thams cad dral ba'o //
analyzed: sen mo dag brud ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus mas rdo rje'i sen mo gnyis brud pas thams cad dral ba'o //
translated: Scratching with the nails means that by scratching with the two vajra nails with the central vajra of the first vajra, all things are split.

original: mig la reg ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rang gi mig mnyes na thams cad rmugs pa'o //
analyzed: mig la reg ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos rang gi mig mnyes na thams cad rmugs pa'o //
translated: The touching of the eyes is that if one touches one's eyes with the tip of the middle vajra of the first [vajra], all [beings] will become stupefied.

original: btsums pa zhes bya ba ni ngang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mor rang gi mig btsums par byas na thams cad gnyid log tu bcug pa'o ;
analyzed: btsums pa zhes bya ba ni ngang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mor rang gi mig btsums par byas na thams cad gnyid log tu bcug pa'o ;
translated: The closing is that if one closes one's eyes with the tip of the middle vajra of the first [vajra], all [beings] will fall asleep.

original: / sor mo mnyam po snying gar brdeg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje'i rtse mo gnyis phan tshun yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: / sor mo mnyam po snying gar brdeg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje'i rtse mo gnyis phan tshun yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The slap at the heart with the fingers together is that one should join the two tips of the middle vajra of the first [vajra] and

original: des rang gi snying gar brdeg par byas na thams cad la rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: des rang gi snying gar brdeg par byas na thams cad la rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: slap at one's heart with that. All [beings] will be sealed.

original: ltung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos ltung ba'i tshul byas na thams cad ltung ba'o //
analyzed: ltung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos ltung ba'i tshul byas na thams cad ltung ba'o //
translated: The falling is that if one makes a gesture of falling with the tip of the middle vajra of the first [vajra], all [beings] will fall.

original: glod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rjes glod par byas na /
analyzed: glod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rjes glod par byas na /
translated: The releasing is that if one releases with the first [vajra],

original: thams cad rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rmongs pa'o //
translated: all [beings] will become confused.

original: phan tshun brdeg pa zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje phan tshun brdegs na thams cad gsad pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun brdeg pa zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje phan tshun brdegs na thams cad gsad pa'o //
translated: The mutual striking is that if one strikes with the first vajra, all are killed.

original: rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The own heart is the natural placement of the action.

original: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar rnal du gzung bar byas na thams cad phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dbus ma'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar rnal du gzung bar byas na thams cad phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one holds the central vajra of that at one's heart, all will be repelled.

original: dbus ma'i rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The central vajra is as before.

original: mda' gtod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mda' gtod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The arrow-aiming is as follows.

original: dang po'i rdo rje'i dbus ma'i rdo rjes mda' gtod @202b pa'i tshul du byas te /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje'i dbus ma'i rdo rjes mda' gtod @202b pa'i tshul du byas te /
translated: With the central vajra of the first vajra, one aims like an arrow.

original: de ltar na thams cad rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na thams cad rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, all will be attracted.🔽The two hooks summoning is as follows.

original: lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos lcags kyu gnyis byas te des bsgrub bya dgug par byas na thams cad 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rtse mos lcags kyu gnyis byas te des bsgrub bya dgug par byas na thams cad 'gugs pa'o //
translated: With the tip of the central vajra of the first vajra, one makes two hooks. By summoning the victim with those, all are summoned.

original: g-yon pa la g-yas pa bcug pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: g-yon pa la g-yas pa bcug pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The right hand inserted into the left is as follows.

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje g-yon pa la g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus ma bcug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o //🔽rtse mo bskyod pas zhes bya ba la /🔽dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo bskyod pa thams cad 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje g-yon pa la g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus ma bcug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o // rtse mo bskyod pas zhes bya ba la / dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje rtse mo bskyod pa thams cad 'bab pa'o //
translated: The “universal entry” is the entry of all [fingers] by inserting the middle finger of the right hand into the left hand’s middle vajra of the first vajra.🔽The “universal shaking of the tips” is the shaking of the tips of all [fingers] by shaking the middle vajra of the first vajra.

original: gdu bu 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje gdu bur bcings pas thams cad 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: gdu bu 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje gdu bur bcings pas thams cad 'ching ba'o //
translated: The “universal binding of the bracelets” is the binding of all [fingers] by binding the bracelets of the middle vajras of the first vajra.

original: myur du dgrol ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje myur du bkrol bas thams cad bkrol ba'o //
analyzed: myur du dgrol ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje myur du bkrol bas thams cad bkrol ba'o //
translated: The “universal quick release” is the release of all [fingers] by quickly releasing the middle vajra of the first vajra.

original: sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje sor mo dbus ma gnyis mnyam por byas la /🔽myur du dral bar byas na thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje sor mo dbus ma gnyis mnyam por byas la /🔽myur du dral bar byas na thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The “universal quick unbinding of the fingers” is the unbinding of all [fingers] by quickly unbinding the two middle fingers of the first vajra.

original: ltung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes ltung ba'i tshul byas te nges thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes ltung ba'i tshul byas te nges thams cad ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The falling is that all [fingers] fall by the manner of falling with the middle vajra of the first vajra.

original: 'og nas bteg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes 'og nas gyen du gdeg par bya ste de ltar na ltung ba slong ba'o //
analyzed: 'og nas bteg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes 'og nas gyen du gdeg par bya ste de ltar na ltung ba slong ba'o //
translated: The raising up is that all [fingers] are raised up by the middle vajra of the first vajra.

original: g-yon pas g-yas pa drang bar zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma'i rdo rje g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus mas drangs nas thams cad 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas g-yas pa drang bar zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma'i rdo rje g-yas pa'i sor mo dbus mas drangs nas thams cad 'dren pa'o //
translated: The drawing in with the left is that all [fingers] are drawn in by the middle finger of the left hand with the middle vajra.

original: las thams cad la sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba'i tshul du byas te /
analyzed: las thams cad la sbyor bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba'i tshul du byas te /
translated: The application to all actions is that all [fingers] are applied to all actions by the middle vajra of the first vajra.

original: de ltar na gnod sbyin la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar na gnod sbyin la sogs pa rjes su 'brang bar byed do //
translated: Thus, yakshas and so forth will follow.

original: 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og nas bskyod cing /
analyzed: 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og nas bskyod cing /
translated: The phrase shaking from below and drawing up means that the central vajra of the first vajra is shaken from below.🔽

original: gyen du bteg pas mngag gzhug bka' bsgo bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gyen du bteg pas mngag gzhug bka' bsgo bar byed pa'o //
translated: Shaking below and drawing upward means that by shaking the central vajra of the first vajra below and drawing it upward, one gives orders to the servants.

original: tshur 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni drang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje tshur drangs pas thams cad tshur 'gugs pa yin no //🔽phar gtong ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes @203a * //
analyzed: tshur 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni drang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje tshur drangs pas thams cad tshur 'gugs pa yin no // phar gtong ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes @203a * //
translated: Drawing in means that by drawing in the central vajra of the straight vajra, one draws in everything.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su khyer zhing bzhag pas phar gtong ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su khyer zhing bzhag pas phar gtong ba'o //
translated: Sending out means that by sending out the central vajra of the first vajra, one sends out to the desired place.

original: g-yon dang g-yas kyis drag por brdeg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i sor mo gnyis khros pas phan tshun brdeg par bya ste de ltar na thams cad gsod pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas kyis drag por brdeg pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i sor mo gnyis khros pas phan tshun brdeg par bya ste de ltar na thams cad gsod pa'o //
translated: Striking violently with the left and right means that by the two fingers of the central vajra of the first vajra striking each other angrily, one kills everything.

original: rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes rtse mo rang gi snying gar gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na slar gso ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rjes rtse mo rang gi snying gar gyen du drang bar bya ste de ltar na slar gso ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The peak-leader at one's heart means that one should lead the peak of the central vajra of the original vajra upward to one's heart; thus one restores and so forth.

original: las thams cad la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: las thams cad la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las zhes bya ba la /
translated: The action of binding all actions means

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad nges par sbyar ba'i tshul gyis dbang du byed pa sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i rdo rje las thams cad nges par sbyar ba'i tshul gyis dbang du byed pa sgrub pa yin no //
translated: that one should accomplish the subjugation of all actions by the method of binding all actions with the central vajra of the original vajra.

original: snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor sprul ba'i bsam pas bskor bar bya ste /
analyzed: snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje bcings la rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor sprul ba'i bsam pas bskor bar bya ste /
translated: The wheel-entry at the heart means that one should bind the original vajra and, with the intention of emanating a maṇḍala, one should circle it in the region of one's heart.

original: de ltar na rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one will accomplish all the supreme spiritual powers of all the families.

original: dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar 'ching bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar 'ching bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The garland of consecration and the binding of silk means🔽that one should bind the original vajra at one's heart and, with the intention of emanating a maṇḍala, one should circle it in the region of one's heart.

original: dang po'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar 'ching ba'i tshul byas te de ltar na dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//🔽snying ga las drangs te bde ba thams cad yongs su spyang ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings te bslangs nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas de nyid kyi bde bas bdag nyid la kun du khyab par byas te de ltar na thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa dang /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar 'ching ba'i tshul byas te de ltar na dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// snying ga las drangs te bde ba thams cad yongs su spyang ba zhes bya ba ni dang po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bcings te bslangs nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'i bsam pas de nyid kyi bde bas bdag nyid la kun du khyab par byas te de ltar na thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa dang /
translated: The garland of the first vajra empowerment and the manner of binding with a silk ribbon: in that way, one attains all the perfections of all the empowerments.

original: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: “Extracted from the heart, the purification of all bliss” means that one binds the first vajra at one’s heart, extracts it, and imagines the experience of bliss and mental bliss. By the bliss of that, one should pervade oneself. In that way, all are engaged in passion, and so on, and all bliss and mental bliss.

original: gar gyis bteg ste spyi por bkrol ba'i las so zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la gar gyi tshul gyis bslangs te spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gar gyis bteg ste spyi por bkrol ba'i las so zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcings la gar gyi tshul gyis bslangs te spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: “The action of lifting with dance and releasing at the crown” means that one should bind the first vajra, extract it with the manner of dance, and release it at the crown.

original: las ni dang po'i rdo rjes rang gi lha'i mchod pa thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las ni dang po'i rdo rjes rang gi lha'i mchod pa thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The function is that by the first vajra, all functions such as the worship of one's deity are accomplished.

original: las rgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: las rgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di dag bstan pa yin no //
translated: These are the characteristics of the seals that accomplish the seal practice.

original: phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di ci'i don du gsungs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di ci'i don du gsungs pa yin zhe na /
translated: For what purpose was this Tantra of the Seals taught?

original: bde ba chen po rab tu bsgrub pa dang // @203b chags pa chen po rnams dag phyir //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu bstan pa yin no //🔽rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab tu bsgrub pa dang // @203b chags pa chen po rnams dag phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu bstan pa yin no // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing great bliss and purifying great passion, etc.

original: zhes bya bas ni rdo rje sems dpas so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni rdo rje sems dpas so //
translated: The statement by the great vajra-holder means by Vajrasattva.

original: des phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gang la bde ba la sogs pa sgrub pa'i don du rab tu brtag pa yin zhe na /🔽sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun //
analyzed: des phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gang la bde ba la sogs pa sgrub pa'i don du rab tu brtag pa yin zhe na / sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun //
translated: For what purpose did he imagine this Tantra of the Seals for the sake of accomplishing bliss, etc.?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: For the sake of all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, etc.

original: sras dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sras dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means for the sake of all the Tathagatas and Bodhisattvas, is the meaning.

original: sems can yang yin la kun kyang yin pas sems can kun te /
analyzed: sems can yang yin la kun kyang yin pas sems can kun te /
translated: Since they are all sentient beings, they are all sentient beings.

original: de dag gi dngos grub myur ba ni gdul bya rnams la skye ba 'di nyid la ;
analyzed: de dag gi dngos grub myur ba ni gdul bya rnams la skye ba 'di nyid la ;
translated: Their quick powers are for the sake of the disciples, in this very life.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'o //
translated: They are the attainment of the powers of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de'i don du /
analyzed: de'i don du /
translated: For that purpose,

original: don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o //
analyzed: don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o //
translated: the bestowal of all powers is not in vain.

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub nges par ster ba ni 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub nges par ster ba ni 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is the bestowal of the powers of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa //
translated: Those who have not entered the mandalas,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: in this case,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir gang dag ma zhugs pa de dag la yang dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir gang dag ma zhugs pa de dag la yang dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di yin no //
translated: those who have not entered this secret mandala of Vajrasattva, for them this tantra of the seal which bestows all powers is for them.

original: sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan //
translated: Even those who have all sinful actions,

analyzed: zhes bya ba la mtshams med pa sogs pa byed pa rnams la yod do //
translated: those who have committed the heinous crimes and so forth.🔽Even they,

original: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: it is easy to understand.

original: mtshams med pa la sogs pa byed pa rnams kyi yang dngos grub thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshams med pa la sogs pa byed pa rnams kyi yang dngos grub thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir grub pa yin no //
translated: And for those who have committed the heinous crimes, etc., all powers are perfected, so they are accomplished.

original: kyang gi sgra ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang / chos dang ldan pa rnams la phyag rgya chen po rgyud 'dis shin tu grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang / chos dang ldan pa rnams la phyag rgya chen po rgyud 'dis shin tu grub pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: The word “also” indicates that those who have entered the maṇḍala and are endowed with the Dharma are very much accomplished in the Great Seal by this Tantra.

original: rgyu gang gi phyir de dag las 'grub pa yin zhe na /🔽bcings pa tsam gyis sdig spyang phyir //
analyzed: rgyu gang gi phyir de dag las 'grub pa yin zhe na / bcings pa tsam gyis sdig spyang phyir //
translated: For what reason are they accomplished from those?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because of the purification of evil merely by binding.

original: gang gi phyir las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams sgrub pa po rnams kyis bcings pa tsam gyis sgrub pa po rnams la sdig pa thams cad sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽gang zhig le lo nyid kyis zhes bya ba la /

translated: Because of the purification of all evil for the adepts merely by binding these seals that accomplish the hundred rites.

analyzed: gang zhig le lo nyams pas yo byad yod kyang 'khor lo brtag par mi nus pa'am /
translated: For one who is lazy, even though the materials exist, one is unable to investigate the wheel.

translated: if one is not endowed with the perfection of the means,

analyzed: sum tshogs pa ma tshad ba de rnams la yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' las brgya 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i nus pa grub par 'gyur te /
translated: then one will not be able to accomplish the hundred acts by means of the binding of the seals of the Blessed One Vajrasattva.

analyzed: de'i phyir bcings pa tsam gyis las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis sdig pa sbyang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, these seals which accomplish the hundred acts by merely being bound should be used to purify evil.🔽Those sentient beings who do not have a mandala🔽means those who have not entered the mandala.

original: dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang //
translated: Those who have not been consecrated by the master

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa'o //

analyzed: slob dpon nyid byin gyis ma brlabs pa zhes bya ba la yang na dkyil 'khor du zhugs na yang slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ma bskur ba'o //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa'am /

original: dbang ma bskur bar dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis rdo rje slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang ma bskur bar dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis rdo rje slob dpon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who enter the maṇḍala without initiation become vajra masters merely by binding the seal.

original: slar yang de'i khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir don yod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: slar yang de'i khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir don yod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te don med pa ma yin no //
translated: Again, in order to teach its distinction, he says, “successful,” not unsuccessful.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Supreme means excellent.

analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It accomplishes all the various desired actions.🔽Merely by binding, it is quickly accomplished.

original: bcings pa tsam gyis myur 'grub ces bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad gdul bya rnams la rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: bcings pa tsam gyis myur 'grub ces bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad gdul bya rnams la rab tu 'jug par byed pa yin no //
translated: All the wishes explained above, all the supreme accomplishments such as buddhahood and bodhisattvahood, are engaged for the disciples.

original: phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gang las byung zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gang las byung zhe na /
translated: From where does this seal tantra arise?

original: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the beginning, etc.

original: bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol du byung bas na dang por byung ba'o //
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol du byung bas na dang por byung ba'o //
translated: It is the first because it arose before this fortunate eon.

original: rdo rje rnams kyi phul du byung bas na rdo rje mchog go //
analyzed: rdo rje rnams kyi phul du byung bas na rdo rje mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme vajra because it is the best of the vajras.

original: dang por byung ba yang yin la rdo rje mchog kyang yin pas na dang por byung ba'i rdo rje mchog go //
analyzed: dang por byung ba yang yin la rdo rje mchog kyang yin pas na dang por byung ba'i rdo rje mchog go //
translated: It is the first because it is the first, and it is the supreme vajra because it is the best of the vajras.

original: dang por byung ba'i rdo rje mchog kyang de nyid yin la bde ba chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: dang por byung ba'i rdo rje mchog kyang de nyid yin la bde ba chen po yang yin pas na /
translated: It is the supreme vajra of the first arising, and it is also great bliss.

original: dang po byung ba'i rdo rje mchog gi bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: dang po byung ba'i rdo rje mchog gi bde ba chen po ste /
translated: It is the great bliss of the supreme vajra of the first arising.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin can thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin can thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: It is the essence of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, the beginningless and endless dharmadhatu.

original: de las byung ba'i skye ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i skye ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called that which has arisen from it, because it has arisen from that.

original: dag pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'o /
analyzed: dag pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba'o /
translated: It is pure because it is free from attachment and so forth.

original: @204b shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i dngos grub kyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: @204b shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa'i dngos grub kyis grub pa'o //
translated: It is called the great accomplishment because it is accomplished by the accomplishment of fearlessness.

original: gang la zhe na 'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang la zhe na 'gro ba thams cad la yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: To all, that is, to all beings.

original: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la yang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la yang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means even those who have not entered the mandala.

original: de ltar las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the tantra of the seal that accomplishes the hundred acts,

original: da yi ge h'um brjod cing las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: da yi ge h'um brjod cing las brgya sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: now, having uttered the syllable hūṃ and formed the seal that accomplishes the hundred acts,🔽after that, one should accomplish the hundred acts by uttering anurāgya mi hūṃ.

original: de'i rjes la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing las brgya rab tu bsgrub bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te
analyzed: de'i rjes la aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba brjod cing las brgya rab tu bsgrub bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te
translated: In order to teach this rite, the Tantra of the Secret of All the Seals is taught.

original: / de nas kyi sgra ni sngar bshad pa'i de ma thag pa'i don ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: / de nas kyi sgra ni sngar bshad pa'i de ma thag pa'i don ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The word “then” indicates the meaning of the immediately preceding explanation.

original: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas phyag rgya thams cad de las brgya sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas phyag rgya thams cad de las brgya sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Since it is a seal and it is all of them, it is all the seals, which accomplish the hundred acts.

original: de rnams sgrub par byed pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de rnams sgrub par byed pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The cause of completion is that which accomplishes those.

original: de ston par byed pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud 'di yin te /
translated: This is the secret tantra which teaches that.🔽One who desires the rite, i.e., one who desires to perform the rite of increasing life, etc.,

original: las 'dod pa zhes bya ba la tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las byed par 'dod pas dang po kho nar yi ge h'um brjod cing dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: las 'dod pa zhes bya ba la tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las byed par 'dod pas dang po kho nar yi ge h'um brjod cing dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya ste /
translated: should first utter the syllable hūṃ and bind the first vajra.

original: de nas aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba bzla zhing las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nas aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba bzla zhing las thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Then, reciting anurāgāya hūṃ, he should accomplish all rites.

original: bde ba chen po'i bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The rites of great bliss, etc., have been explained.

original: rgyud phyi ma'i chog rgyas ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma'i chog rgyas ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The extensive rite of the continuation of the tantra.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin gyi chog rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i rgyun te yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa yin no //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin gyi chog rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i rgyun te yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa yin no //
translated: The extensive rite of the nature of the tantra of the secret mandala of glorious Vajrasattva is the completion of the continuum of the object of attainment and the means of attainment.

original: de ltar du ma bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma rgyas par bshad pa byas nas da ni ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams gshegs su gsol nas /
analyzed: de ltar du ma bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang rgyud phyi ma rgyas par bshad pa byas nas da ni ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams gshegs su gsol nas /
translated: Having thus explained the root tantra and the explanatory tantra in detail, now, having requested the departure of the maṇḍala that was drawn just as it is,

original: slob dpon gyis sprul ba rang gi lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis sprul ba rang gi lus la bcug ste /
translated: the master should cause the emanations to enter his own body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir bdag nyid gsol ba 'debs pa byed par rnam par bsams la yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas bdag nyid bsrung par byas la ldang🔽bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba @205a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir bdag nyid gsol ba 'debs pa byed par rnam par bsams la yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas bdag nyid bsrung par byas la ldang bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba @205a * //
translated: Thinking that he himself is supplicating in order to bless this imagination of all tathāgatas, having recited the verse of consecration that is complete and final, he should rise, having protected himself.

original: la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, [the Bhagavān] declares thereupon, etc.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Thereupon the Bhagavān, the tathāgata, was supplicated by all tathāgatas to Vajrasattva.

original: ji ltar zhe na yongs su mthar thug pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su mthar thug pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na yongs su mthar thug pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yongs su mthar thug pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: How?🔽The phrase “without limit” means “without completion.”

original: yongs su mthar thug pa med pa ni yongs su mthar ma thug pa ste yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug pa med pa ni yongs su mthar ma thug pa ste yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o //
translated: “Without limit” means “without completion,” i.e., “without being finished.”

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab par byed pa'i gzugs thams cad gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gyi don mdzad
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' thams cad khyab par byed pa'i gzugs thams cad gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gyi don mdzad
translated: The phrase “the application of the activity of all vajra body, speech, and mind” means that the Blessed Buddhas, by the wisdom that sees all forms that pervade all of space, work for the welfare of sentient beings for as long as cyclic existence lasts.

original: pa ste mthar thug pa med pa'i sbyor ba nges de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: pa ste mthar thug pa med pa'i sbyor ba nges de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: The application that is without limit is what they request.

original: 'o na de rnams gcig bu yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na de rnams gcig bu yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are they alone?

original: rdo rje 'chang dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po ngang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po ngang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: The phrase “together with Vajradhara” means that they are together with the great Vajradharas, such as Vajramanas, etc.

original: ci'i don du zhe na 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: For what purpose?

original: rtog ba'i rgyal po chen po 'dir yongs su mthar thug pa'i don to zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtog ba'i rgyal po chen po 'dir yongs su mthar thug pa'i don to zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Here in this great king of tantras, the meaning is completely concluded.

original: dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i thog ma tha ma med pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'o //
analyzed: dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i thog ma tha ma med pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'o //
translated: The second chapter, the nature of the root and continuation tantras, has just been explained. The nature of the pristine consciousness of the space of the beginningless and endless is the perfection of generosity and the pledge seal.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni gzugs thams cad ston par nam mkha' thams cad khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni gzugs thams cad ston par nam mkha' thams cad khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: The pledge of the secret vajra of great bliss is the display of all forms that pervades all space.

original: khams thams cad ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni khams thams cad do //
analyzed: khams thams cad ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni khams thams cad do //
translated: All constituents are the constituents of space, the realm of phenomena, and the particles of all world realms.

original: khams thams cad kyang de yin la ma lus pa yang de yin pas khams thams cad ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: khams thams cad kyang de yin la ma lus pa yang de yin pas khams thams cad ma lus pa'o //
translated: All elements are that, and all without exception are that, so they are all elements without exception.

original: der kun du 'gro ba ni spro ba ste khyab pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: der kun du 'gro ba ni spro ba ste khyab pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The one who is completely devoted to that is the one who is pervaded by that, who has that.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rgyun gang la yod pa de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rgyun gang la yod pa de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The extensive ritual of all powers such as the Great Seal is the continuity of the object of attainment and the means of attainment, and the one who has that is called that.

original: srid pa thams @205b cad kyi mtha' ni khams gsum gyi rang bzhin can te de yongs su mthar ma thug pa'i gsung rab kyi bstan pa gang la yong ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: srid pa thams @205b cad kyi mtha' ni khams gsum gyi rang bzhin can te de yongs su mthar ma thug pa'i gsung rab kyi bstan pa gang la yong ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The end of all existence is the nature of the three realms, and the one who has the teaching of the scriptures that has not reached its end is called that.

original: de yongs su mthar thug pa'i don ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: de yongs su mthar thug pa'i don ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of its having reached its end is because it is complete, Vajrasattva without beginning or end is requested by all the Tathagatas.

original: gang zhig yongs su mthar thug pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis khyad par slar yang bstan pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha' la sogs pa gsungs te nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
analyzed: gang zhig yongs su mthar thug pa'i byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyis khyad par slar yang bstan pa'i phyir rdo rje nam mkha' la sogs pa gsungs te nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
translated: In order to fully teach the meaning of the consecration, the king of tantras again teaches the distinctions with the vajra space, and so on.🔽

original: bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach the special quality of that very king of contemplations which is supplicated for the sake of the consecration of complete perfection, the Vajra Space, etc. is stated, because it is the nature of the wisdom of the equality of space.

original: rdo rje ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni nam mkha'o //
translated: Vajra is space.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings chen po spro ba ste de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings chen po spro ba ste de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: For this very reason, the great realm of phenomena is the emanation, the thing pervaded by suchness.

original: rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid de /
translated: The vehicle of Vajradhara is this very king of contemplations.

original: de'i phyir rtog pa gzhan dag las mchog ste phul du byung ba'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir rtog pa gzhan dag las mchog ste phul du byung ba'o ;
translated: Therefore, it is supreme, the best, among other contemplations.

original: / chos thams cad las khyab par byed pa'i de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje nam mkha' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: / chos thams cad las khyab par byed pa'i de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje nam mkha' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: The suchness which pervades all phenomena is the great vajra space, the realm of phenomena.

original: de spro ba'i dngos grub ni de bzhin nyid rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de spro ba'i dngos grub ni de bzhin nyid rtog pa'o //
translated: The emanation of that is the suchness contemplation.

original: de stsol bas na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i chos kyi dbyings spro pa'i dngos grub stsol ba ste /
analyzed: de stsol bas na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i chos kyi dbyings spro pa'i dngos grub stsol ba ste /
translated: Since he bestows that, he bestows the spiritual powers of the emanation of the dharmadhatu of Great Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi theg pa de yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi theg pa de yin no //
translated: That is the vehicle of the Vajradharas.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i theg pa chen po ste rdo rje 'chang gcig bu'i ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i theg pa chen po ste rdo rje 'chang gcig bu'i ma yin te /
translated: The Mahayana that has become so is not just the vehicle of Vajradhara alone.

original: 'on kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: However, it is always the vehicle of all the buddhas together with Great Vajradhara.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yongs grub pa ba gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yongs grub pa ba gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
translated: The buddhas are Vairochana, Akshobya, Ratnasambhava, Amitabha, and Amoghasiddhi, equal to the particles of all world systems.

original: de dag nyid rtag tu ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid rtag tu ste /
translated: They are always together.

original: dus thams cad du de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje chen po 'dzin pas na /
analyzed: dus thams cad du de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje chen po 'dzin pas na /
translated: Since they always hold the great vajra of suchness,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po ste rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi lha'i rang bzhin can rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po ste rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi lha'i rang bzhin can rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: Great Vajradhara, i.e., Vajrasattva, etc., is the nature of all the deities.

original: de dang bcas pa ni de dang lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: de dang bcas pa ni de dang lhan cig tu'o //
translated: Together with him means together with him.

original: rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni //🔽zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid rdo rje 'chang @206a * //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni // zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid rdo rje 'chang @206a * //
translated: The vehicle of Vajradhara

original: chen po ste /
analyzed: chen po ste /
translated: means that the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas themselves are Great Vajradhara.

original: de rnams nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de theg pa yin te gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po de theg pa yin te gzhan dag ni ma yin no //
translated: That great king of concepts of them is the vehicle, not any other.

original: yongs su mthar thug nus pa min //
analyzed: yongs su mthar thug nus pa min //
translated: It is not possible to reach the end of it.

original: zhes bya ba la nam mkha' khyab pas mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'i theg pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la nam mkha' khyab pas mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'i theg pa yin te /
translated: The vehicle of the king of concepts is because of the infinity of space.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su rdzogs par bstan pas gdul bya rnams la bstan par mi spyod pa de'i phyir le lo can la mdor bsdus nas rab tu bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir rtog pa 'di yongs su mthar thug par byin gyis brlab
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su rdzogs par bstan pas gdul bya rnams la bstan par mi spyod pa de'i phyir le lo can la mdor bsdus nas rab tu bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir rtog pa 'di yongs su mthar thug par byin gyis brlab
translated: Since the buddhas and bodhisattvas do not teach disciples by teaching in a complete way, in order to teach the lazy in a concise way, this chapter is blessed to be brought to completion.🔽

original: pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab pa yin no //
translated: Since the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas have taught it in its entirety, they do not teach it to disciples in brief. Therefore, in order to bless this thought to be brought to completion, the Tathagatas request Great Vajradhara to teach it in brief for the lazy.

original: dngos po mi sdug pa la zhen pas na ngan zhen no //
analyzed: dngos po mi sdug pa la zhen pas na ngan zhen no //
translated: Those who are attached to unpleasant things are called those with bad attachments.

original: ae ma'i sgra ni rjes su bzung ba la'o //
analyzed: ae ma'i sgra ni rjes su bzung ba la'o //
translated: The word ema is used for accepting.

original: rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po thos pa dang / bsam pa la rab tu 'jug pa la dbang ba med pa'i sems can ni le lo can no //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po thos pa dang / bsam pa la rab tu 'jug pa la dbang ba med pa'i sems can ni le lo can no //
translated: Those who are lazy are sentient beings who are not empowered to engage in hearing and contemplating the great king of tantras.

original: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la spyod pas na las kun ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la spyod pas na las kun ldan pa'o //
translated: Those who engage in all actions are those who engage in the ten unvirtuous actions.

original: thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
analyzed: thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
translated: You, the vajra of sublime compassion,

original: ces bya ba la dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The nature of the great compassion which is without an objective referent is the sacred compassion vajra.

original: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
translated: The enlightenment mind is unsurpassed.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: And so on.

original: rab sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni rgya che bas 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: rab sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni rgya che bas 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
translated: The accomplishment is the accomplishment of the desired power for those who are afraid of the vastness.

original: de ltar yongs su mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos mdor bsdus pa'i gzhung byin gyis brlabs la thugs rtse gcig par mdzad nas /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos mdor bsdus pa'i gzhung byin gyis brlabs la thugs rtse gcig par mdzad nas /
translated: Thus, the Blessed One, the Great Vajradhara, having been requested to bless the ultimate perfection, having blessed the text of the concise version, having become one-pointed,

original: bde ba chen po rab sgrub pa //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rab sgrub pa //
translated: The accomplishment of great bliss

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa gsung pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa gsung pa yin no //
translated: and so on, is the teaching of the complete blessing.

original: gang gi tshul 'di nyan par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gi tshul 'di nyan par 'gyur //
translated: Whoever listens to this method,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshul 'dis ni dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma 'khrul pa med pa'i rna ba'i shes pa mchog ste phul du byung ba nyan par 'gyur ba'am /🔽rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul 'di glegs bam la bris te sems can gang dag gi khyim na gnas par gyur pa de rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du @206b bshad pa'i phan yon can gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshul 'dis ni dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma 'khrul pa med pa'i rna ba'i shes pa mchog ste phul du byung ba nyan par 'gyur ba'am / rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul 'di glegs bam la bris te sems can gang dag gi khyim na gnas par gyur pa de rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du @206b bshad pa'i phan yon can gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid
translated: In this way, the root tantra of the second section and the subsequent tantra, the supreme and excellent ear-whispered lineage, will be heard.🔽Or, this method of the secret nature of all the families, written in a book, will remain in the homes of sentient beings.

original: la 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: la 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Those who properly explain it will attain the desired powers endowed with the benefits as explained, in this very life.

original: ji ltar bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po'i gdul bya rnams la sdig pa yongs su zas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thog mar spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul mdzad pa de bzhin du 'dir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po'i gdul bya rnams la sdig pa yongs su zas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thog mar spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul mdzad pa de bzhin du 'dir ni ma yin te /
translated: Just as the disciples of the Action Tantra and so forth, in order to purify their sins, the Tathagatas first performed the conduct and so forth, it is not so here.

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs kho nas sdig pa yongs su zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs kho nas sdig pa yongs su zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the power of meditation alone exhausts evil.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyis phyir phyi rol gyi bgegs rnams 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyis phyir phyi rol gyi bgegs rnams 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For this very reason, external obstacles do not arise.

original: bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med //
analyzed: bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med //
translated: There is no obstacle, and likewise no demon.

original: rtog par zhes bya ba la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi mi dmigs pa'i phyir rtog pa 'dir dngos grub thams cad 'phel ba kho nar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: rtog par zhes bya ba la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi mi dmigs pa'i phyir rtog pa 'dir dngos grub thams cad 'phel ba kho nar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: In the conception, by the power of the meditation of the wisdom of equality, the four demons are not perceived. This conception is blessed as the increase of all powers.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdud chen po'i gzugs dmigs pa'i nus pas bdud nyid du bdag 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdud chen po'i gzugs dmigs pa'i nus pas bdud nyid du bdag 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dir ni ma yin no //
translated: For those who are attached to the mandala that is drawn just as it is, by the power of the perception of the form of the great demon, one becomes a demon. But that is not so here.

original: bstan pa med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: bstan pa med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The absence of teaching and so on is easy to understand.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
translated: This shows the following:

original: ji lta ba bzhin bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol ba la slob dpon gyis sprul pa rang gi lus la bcug ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol ba la slob dpon gyis sprul pa rang gi lus la bcug ste /
translated: Having made offerings in the manner explained above to the maṇḍala that is drawn just as it is, one should request the departure of the deities. The master should cause the emanations to enter his own body.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
translated: Having contemplated oneself as Vajrasattva, who is requested by the Tathāgatas,

original: byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas /
translated: one should recite the verse of consecration.

original: rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na yang rdo rje sems dpa' yang nas yang du yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na yang rdo rje sems dpa' yang nas yang du yongs su bzlas te /
translated: Having protected oneself with the pledge seals of Vajravarada, Vajrāgra, and Vajramuṣṭi, one should recite the mantra of Vajrasattva again and again.

original: yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod nas langs te /
analyzed: yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod nas langs te /
translated: Having recited the hundred-syllable mantra three times, one should rise up.

original: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: One should do whatever one wishes, such as reading the scriptures, and so on.

original: dge ba'i bya bas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bya bas gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should remain in virtuous activities.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The great bliss, and so on, is as follows.

original: bde ba chen po ni 'dir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te de nyid rdo rje'o //🔽de'i gsang ba ni de dang rgyu mthun pa'i dum bu gnyis pa la rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma'i @207a * //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni 'dir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te de nyid rdo rje'o // de'i gsang ba ni de dang rgyu mthun pa'i dum bu gnyis pa la rtsa ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma'i @207a * //
translated: Great bliss is the gnosis of equality here, and that itself is the vajra.

original: rang bzhin can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: Its secret is the first part, which has the nature of the Root Tantra and the King of Tantras, the Continuation Tantra, which is concordant with that.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal ba bzang po las snga nas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal ba bzang po las snga nas gnas pa'o //
translated: The first is the one that existed before the Fortunate Eon.

original: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu la ltos na mchog gi bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /🔽mchog tu grub pa yin no //
analyzed: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu la ltos na mchog gi bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir / mchog tu grub pa yin no //
translated: Supreme accomplishment is supreme because it is the nature of the extensive ritual of the means of accomplishment in comparison with the part on the perfection of wisdom.🔽It is supreme accomplishment.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
translated: Complete is ultimate.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i ngo bo dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i ngo bo dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa /

analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta mkhas pa chen po mantra ka la sha dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po bod kyi dpal lha btsan po lha bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
