original: // / de ltar dum bu gnyis pa rtsa rta ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma gsungs nas ;
analyzed: // / de ltar dum bu gnyis pa rtsa rta ba'i rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma gsungs nas ;
translated: Having thus taught the second chapter, the Root Tantra, and the Later Tantra,

original: da ni dum bu gnyis pa nyid kyi rtog pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin sgrub pa po'i rang bzhin myur du grub pa bshad pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: da ni dum bu gnyis pa nyid kyi rtog pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin sgrub pa po'i rang bzhin myur du grub pa bshad pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: now, in order to teach the nature of the tantra of all the chapters of the second part, the nature of the practitioner’s swift accomplishment, he says “then,” and so on.

original: de nas dang po gnas nyams dgar //
analyzed: de nas dang po gnas nyams dgar //
translated: Then, in the beginning, in a delightful place,

original: bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs //
translated: the great bliss is situated.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This is how it is applied.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te dum bu dang po dang gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i don gyi bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyis dngos grub myur du sgrub par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs la /🔽sngar gsungs pa'i sgrub pa des /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te dum bu dang po dang gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i don gyi bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyis dngos grub myur du sgrub par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs la / sngar gsungs pa'i sgrub pa des /
translated: Then is a word indicating immediacy, and the Bhagavān Vajrasattva has taught the rapid practice of the powers by the special practice taught in the first and second chapters.

original: gal te bdag cag ma grub par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bdag cag ma grub par gyur na /
translated: If we do not succeed by that practice taught previously,

original: yang don de nyid sgrub par bya'i /
analyzed: yang don de nyid sgrub par bya'i /
translated: we should practice that very meaning again,🔽and should not give it up even at the cost of our lives.

original: srog la thug kyang dor bar mi bya'o zhes mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
analyzed: srog la thug kyang dor bar mi bya'o zhes mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
translated: Immediately after knowing the thoughts of disciples who have such a strong desire,

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog mar @207b gnas pa'i phyir dang por ro //
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog mar @207b gnas pa'i phyir dang por ro //
translated: first is the beginning, because it abides at the beginning of the good eon and so forth.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na gnas te /
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na gnas te /
translated: Abiding is the basis of all celestial mansions, and so it is abiding.

original: dang po yang yin la gnas kyang yin pas na dang po'i gnas so //
analyzed: dang po yang yin la gnas kyang yin pas na dang po'i gnas so //
translated: Since it is the first and it is an abiding, it is the first abiding.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, “pleasing,”

original: shin tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas yid dang rjes su mthun pa yin pas na yid du 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas yid dang rjes su mthun pa yin pas na yid du 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: because it is pleasing, since it is agreeable to the mind, as stated by “endowed with the most excellent application, glorious Vajrasattva,” etc.

original: rnam mkha' yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na nam mkha' kun te /
analyzed: rnam mkha' yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na nam mkha' kun te /
translated: Space is all, thus it is all space,

original: phyogs bcu na rdzas dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rnams so//
analyzed: phyogs bcu na rdzas dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rnams so//
translated: the ten directions, which are of the nature of being devoid of substance.

original: de na zla ba lta bur rab tu snang bas na gdul bya thams cad kyi rgyud la so sor snad bar gyur pa de ni /🔽nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: de na zla ba lta bur rab tu snang bas na gdul bya thams cad kyi rgyud la so sor snad bar gyur pa de ni / nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
translated: Since it appears there like the moon, it is the individual appearance in the mindstreams of all those to be trained.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is well-established in all space.

original: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'o //
translated: Vajra jewel means a wish-granting jewel marked with a five-pronged vajra.

original: de rnams kyi 'od ni 'od zer rnams te de rnams kyis 'di gsal zhing snang bar byas pas na rdo rje rin chen 'od 'bar gsal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'od ni 'od zer rnams te de rnams kyis 'di gsal zhing snang bar byas pas na rdo rje rin chen 'od 'bar gsal zhes bya'o //
translated: The light of those is the light rays, and since this is illuminated and made manifest by those, it is called the blazing light of the vajra jewel.

original: brgyan cing zhes bya ba ni dar dang / gdugs dang / dri dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / sgo khyud dang / rta ba bas rnam ba sna tshogs dang / skas dang / mda' yab kyi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing spungs pa'o //
analyzed: brgyan cing zhes bya ba ni dar dang / gdugs dang / dri dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / sgo khyud dang / rta ba bas rnam ba sna tshogs dang / skas dang / mda' yab kyi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing spungs pa'o //
translated: Adorned means heaped with various banners, parasols, scents, incense, lamps, gateways, and archways, with stairways, railings, and so on.

original: dri med pa dang sa ldan zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'od dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas snang bar byas na dri med mdangs ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dri med pa dang sa ldan zhes bya ba ni rang gi 'od dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas snang bar byas na dri med mdangs ldan pa'o //
translated: Possessing stainless radiance means that since it is illuminated by the stainless light of one's own radiance, which is equal to space, it possesses stainless radiance.

original: de ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa yang yin la brgyan pa yang yin zhing dri ma med ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa yang yin la brgyan pa yang yin zhing dri ma med ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yin pas na /
translated: Since it is illuminated by the light of the vajra jewel, it is adorned and possesses stainless radiance.

original: rdo rje rin chen 'od kyis gsal //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen 'od kyis gsal //
translated: The vajra jewel is illuminated by light.

original: brgyan cing dri med mdangs ldan pa'o //
analyzed: brgyan cing dri med mdangs ldan pa'o //
translated: It is adorned and possesses stainless radiance.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus.

original: brgyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa'i gnas der ro //
analyzed: brgyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa'i gnas der ro //
translated: In that place, which is adorned and radiant.

original: zur bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: zur bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
translated: The four corners, etc. are self-evident.

original: rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod //
translated: The assembly of vajra goddesses worships.

original: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzungs kyi lha mo'i tshogs ni rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs te de rnams kha khyer la gnas pa rnams ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //🔽grva yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni @208a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzungs kyi lha mo'i tshogs ni rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs te de rnams kha khyer la gnas pa rnams ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed pa'o // grva yi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni @208a * //
translated: The assembly of the goddesses of the dhāraṇīs of all the Buddhas is the assembly of vajra goddesses. They, abiding in the ledges, worship and honor with the worship of flowers, etc.🔽In all the corners

original: mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: mtshams rnams su //
translated: and in the intermediate directions of the door-lintels,🔽the blazing vajra jewels

original: zla ba phyed la gnas pa yis //🔽rdo rje rin chen yang dag 'bar //
analyzed: zla ba phyed la gnas pa yis // rdo rje rin chen yang dag 'bar //
translated: are situated on half-moons.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di dag tu zla ba kham pa la gnas ba'i rdo rje rin po che 'od 'bar ba yod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di dag tu zla ba kham pa la gnas ba'i rdo rje rin po che 'od 'bar ba yod pa'o //
translated: In these places there are blazing vajra jewels situated on half-moons.🔽The wind-raised

original: rlung gis bteg pa ni zhes bya ba ni bteg pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gis bteg pa ni zhes bya ba ni bteg pa'o //
translated: is raised.🔽The various

analyzed: sna tshogs ba ni kha dog tha dad pa ste /
translated: is of different colors.

original: kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The colors are blue, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: gnas gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang du zhe na /
translated: Where is it located?

original: rtser zhes bya ba smos te rtse ni mthar te thams cad kyi 'og gi char ro //
analyzed: rtser zhes bya ba smos te rtse ni mthar te thams cad kyi 'og gi char ro //
translated: The root text states, “at the peak.” The peak is the end, the lowest part of everything.

original: gang gi mthar zhes na ba dan zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi mthar zhes na ba dan zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: At the end of what? The root text states, “of the banner.”

original: de lta bu'i ba dan de'i rtse mor ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ba dan de'i rtse mor ro //
translated: It is at the peak of such a banner.

original: dril bu btags pa sgra sgrogs pa yin pas na /
analyzed: dril bu btags pa sgra sgrogs pa yin pas na /
translated: Since the bell is attached to it and makes a sound,

original: rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa //🔽ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa // ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs //
translated: the banner is moved by the wind in various ways.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The root text states, “The banner at the peak, with a bell that makes a sound.”

original: dra ba ni mu tig gi chun 'phyang mchog dbus su btags pa'o //
analyzed: dra ba ni mu tig gi chun 'phyang mchog dbus su btags pa'o //
translated: The net is a supreme pearl garland that is attached in the middle.

original: me long ni me long gi dkyil 'khor nyid do //
analyzed: me long ni me long gi dkyil 'khor nyid do //
translated: The mirrors are the surfaces of the mirrors.

original: me tog rtag ces bya ba ni me tog gi shing rtag tu me tog thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i tshul gyis rtag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: me tog rtag ces bya ba ni me tog gi shing rtag tu me tog thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i tshul gyis rtag par gnas pa'o //
translated: The flowers are always present in the form of a constant rain of all flowers.

original: me tog gi phreng ba ni me tog gi chun 'phyang ngo //
analyzed: me tog gi phreng ba ni me tog gi chun 'phyang ngo //
translated: The flower garlands are pearl garlands.

original: rgyan gyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa las gzhan pa dag yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyan gyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa las gzhan pa dag yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: “Adorned” should be understood as other than what has been explained.

original: dra ba la sogs pa de rnams kyis bskor ba ni kun nas bskor te mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: dra ba la sogs pa de rnams kyis bskor ba ni kun nas bskor te mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: “Surrounded” by those nets, etc. , is “completely surrounded, beautified. ”

original: bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po ste /
translated: “Great bliss” is great liberation.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po'i rdo rje ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The first vajra of the Blessed One Vajrasattva, arisen from the cause of that, is the great bliss vajra.

original: rdo rje dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ni rdo rje kun no //
analyzed: rdo rje dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje ni rdo rje kun no //
translated: The vajra, the vajra gem, the lotus, and the crossed vajra are all vajras.

original: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje kun gyis mngon par 'du byas pa ni de las byas shing bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje kun gyis mngon par 'du byas pa ni de las byas shing bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The great bliss vajra and all vajras are “formed” by that, i.e., produced from that.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnas rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas na /🔽rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che //
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnas rnams kyi gzhir gyur pas na / rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che //
translated: Since it is the basis of the mundane and supramundane abodes,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: it is the great abode of Vajrasattva.

original: de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus par mdzad pas bzhugs gnas su mdzad ba na /
analyzed: de ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus par mdzad pas bzhugs gnas su mdzad ba na /
translated: It is the abode of the Tathagatas equal to the dust particles of all world systems, because they are assembled there.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa //
translated: It is attended by all the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya'o // byang chub kyi rang bzhin can @208b gyi sems dpa'i ni byang chub sems dpa' ste rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // byang chub kyi rang bzhin can @208b gyi sems dpa'i ni byang chub sems dpa' ste rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The Bodhisattva of the nature of enlightenment is the Bodhisattva, i.e. Vajrasattva.

original: de'i gnas su gyur pa de nyid kyis na mchog go //
analyzed: de'i gnas su gyur pa de nyid kyis na mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme abode of him.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba kun ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa la sogs pa dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba kun ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje chags pa la sogs pa dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the Vajradharas are Vajrasattva, Vajraraja, Vajraraga, etc., and Vajracaitya, etc.

original: de rnams kyi gnas ni bzhugs gnas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas ni bzhugs gnas so //
translated: Their abode is the place of dwelling.

original: de ni bde ba chen po'i nor bu rin chen gyi mchog ces bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: de ni bde ba chen po'i nor bu rin chen gyi mchog ces bya ba yin pas na /
translated: That is the supreme jewel of the great bliss gem.

original: de lta bu gang yin pa de la ni /🔽bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
analyzed: de lta bu gang yin pa de la ni / bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
translated: That which is like that is🔽the great bliss, the great vajra,

original: nor bu rin chen mchog ces bya //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen mchog ces bya //
translated: the supreme jewel of the great gem.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is.

original: rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang //
translated: The great vajra palace.

original: de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa ni rnam par gnas par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs pa ni rnam par gnas par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Then, the great bliss, the vajra being, abides, i.e., is situated.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: thog ma tha ma med sems pa //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med sems pa //
translated: The mind without beginning or end.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on is declared.

original: de la thog ma tha ma med pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin pa'o //
analyzed: de la thog ma tha ma med pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin pa'o //
translated: There, the mind without beginning or end, etc. , has been explained.

original: sna tshogs btsun mo'i tshogs bcas par //
analyzed: sna tshogs btsun mo'i tshogs bcas par //
translated: Together with the host of various queens.

original: zhes bya ba la sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang mi rgyu pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni rgyu dang mi rgyu pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: There, the various is the nature of all things, moving and unmoving.

original: btsun mo'i tshogs gang zhig dang lhan cig bzhugs she na /
analyzed: btsun mo'i tshogs gang zhig dang lhan cig bzhugs she na /
translated: With what host of queens does he abide?

original: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor //
translated: Surrounded by vajra goddesses.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is declared.

original: rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang rdo rje k'i li k'i li dang / rdo rje dran pa dang / rdo rje snyems pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang rdo rje k'i li k'i li dang / rdo rje dran pa dang / rdo rje snyems pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yin gyi /
translated: and the Vajra Weapon, the Vajra Kali Kali, the Vajra Recollection, the Vajra Arrogance, and so forth, surrounded by the Vajra Goddesses.

original: 'khor ba'i bud med rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bud med rnams kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning: it is not surrounded by the women of cyclic existence.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: de nas dang po'i gnas nyams dga' //
analyzed: de nas dang po'i gnas nyams dga' //
translated: then, the first abode is delightful,

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning from here,

original: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mos yongs su bskor //
translated: surrounded by the Vajra Goddesses.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //🔽da ni bde chen rab sgrub phyir //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no // da ni bde chen rab sgrub phyir //
translated: Up to here is the explanation of the first concentration.🔽Now, the second concentration is taught, beginning with🔽in order to accomplish the supreme bliss,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te thar pa chen po rab tu grub pa ni bde ba chen pos rab tu grub pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te thar pa chen po rab tu grub pa ni bde ba chen pos rab tu grub pa'o //
translated: the supreme accomplishment of liberation is the accomplishment of supreme bliss.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag cing 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral bas sems can smin cing grol ba'i tshul gyis 'grub bo //🔽ma lus 'dul ba ni sems can gyi khams bskal ba dang ldan pa dang / mi ldan pa rnams kyi byang chub chen por bskyed @209a * //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag cing 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral bas sems can smin cing grol ba'i tshul gyis 'grub bo // ma lus 'dul ba ni sems can gyi khams bskal ba dang ldan pa dang / mi ldan pa rnams kyi byang chub chen por bskyed @209a * //
translated: It is accomplished by the method of maturing and liberating sentient beings, through the purification of great passion of the disciples, and through freedom from passion, etc.

original: pa ni ma lus 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: pa ni ma lus 'dul ba ste /
translated: The taming of all is the generation of the great enlightenment of the realms of sentient beings, whether they are endowed with eons or not.

original: de'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i don du'o //
translated: It is for that purpose that the Bhagavat taught the essence together with the essence of the essence in the first eon.

original: dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi rgyu rnams grub pa ste /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi rgyu rnams grub pa ste /
translated: All powers are the accomplishments of the causes of mundane and supramundane actions.

original: de rab tu grub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po bskal ba dang por gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rab tu grub pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po bskal ba dang por gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: For the sake of their complete accomplishment, the Bhagavat taught the essence together with the essence of the essence in the first eon.

original: bcom ldan 'das khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the Bhagavat's special quality?

original: dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares commitment, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshul ni dam tshig go //
translated: The method of the Great Seal of the Blessed Vajrasattva is the commitment.

original: dam tshig mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya'o //
translated: The supreme commitment is the Tathagatas, and their commitment is not to be transgressed.

original: rgyal pos kyang ni bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: rgyal pos kyang ni bsrung bar bya //
translated: The king should also protect it.🔽This is the Great Seal of the Blessed One.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i gdul bya'i sems can gang yin pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nges par sprul par bya ba yin pas des na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i gdul bya'i sems can gang yin pa la rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nges par sprul par bya ba yin pas des na /
translated: The one who is a sentient being to be tamed by Vajrasattva is to be definitely emanated by the Tathagatas in the manner of Vajrasattva, and therefore🔽the king should also protect it.🔽The one who is a sentient being to be tamed by Vajrasattva is to be definitely emanated by the Tathagatas in the manner of Vajrasattva, and therefore

original: rgyal pos kyang ni bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: rgyal pos kyang ni bsrung bar bya //
translated: the king should also protect it.

original: zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //🔽rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'o // rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing //
translated: This is the Great Seal of the Blessed One.🔽Holding the manner of Vajra Arrogance,

original: snyems dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor //
analyzed: snyems dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor //
translated: with arrogance, one should brandish the vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de nyid mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de nyid mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: Having bound one's own Great Seal, one should manifest it.

original: phyag rgya thams cad myur grub phyir //
analyzed: phyag rgya thams cad myur grub phyir //
translated: For the swift accomplishment of all seals,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thams cad rings par grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thams cad rings par grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because all the mundane and supramundane great seal and so forth are quickly accomplished.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the supreme vajra essence.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rtog pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rtog pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because the great Vajradhara is the supreme vajra essence siddhi of the disciples who are conceptual.

original: / dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po //
analyzed: / dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po //
translated: The great means for all siddhis.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir te thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na thabs chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir te thabs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na thabs chen po'o //
translated: This is because all mundane and supramundane siddhis are attained. It is a means and it is great, hence it is the great means.

original: bsod nams kun gyi cher mtho ba //
analyzed: bsod nams kun gyi cher mtho ba //
translated: The great height of all merit.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad ni bsod nams kun no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad ni bsod nams kun no //
translated: All mundane and supramundane merit is all merit.

original: de rnams kyi chen po yang yin la mtho ba yang yin bas na bsod nams cher mtho ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi chen po yang yin la mtho ba yang yin bas na bsod nams cher mtho ba ste /
translated: Since it is the greatest and the highest of those, it is the great and high merit.

original: snying po de de'i rgyur gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po de de'i rgyur gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since that essence is the cause of that,

original: ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
analyzed: ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
translated: it is endowed with the wisdom seal.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa nu r'a ga ya mi @209b zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa nu r'a ga ya mi @209b zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is anuvāgyāmi.

original: bzla ba'i don gyis ye shes ni phyag rgya ste de dang bcas shing yang dag par ldan pas ye shes kyi phyag rgyar ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bzla ba'i don gyis ye shes ni phyag rgya ste de dang bcas shing yang dag par ldan pas ye shes kyi phyag rgyar ldan pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the seal, in the sense of being the object of meditation, and it is endowed with that, and is perfectly endowed with it, so it is endowed with the wisdom seal.

original: de su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de su zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Who is that?

original: snying po chen po zhes bya ba gsungs te yi ge h'um zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snying po chen po zhes bya ba gsungs te yi ge h'um zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The great essence is stated, which means the syllable hūṃ.

original: de nyid ni thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston par byed pas na dam pa yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston par byed pas na dam pa yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Since that very essence is the highest of all, and it is the teacher of unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, it is called the holy.

original: gang gis zhes bya ba ni snying po gang gis so //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba ni snying po gang gis so //
translated: By what? By what essence.

original: bsod nams mi ldan pa'am zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa yang ngo //
analyzed: bsod nams mi ldan pa'am zhes bya ba ni mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa yang ngo //
translated: “Even without merit” means even one who has done the actions of the five inexpiable sins, and so on.

original: de bzhin dkyil 'khor med pa'ang yin ;
analyzed: de bzhin dkyil 'khor med pa'ang yin ;
translated: “Likewise, without a maṇḍala”

original: / zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor dag tu ji lta ba bzhin du ma zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor dag tu ji lta ba bzhin du ma zhugs pa'o //
translated: means not having entered the maṇḍalas in the proper way.

original: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
analyzed: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
translated: “Effective” means having a result.

original: de nyid kyis na thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: By that very fact, it is “unimpeded.”

original: myur ba ni tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub myur du thob pa'o //
analyzed: myur ba ni tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub myur du thob pa'o //
translated: “Swift” means that one quickly attains the powers of the great seal, and so on, in this very life.

original: mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: “Supreme” means holy.

original: dngos grub thams cad rnyed mi dka' //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rnyed mi dka' //
translated: “All powers are not hard to get”

original: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: means that all powers, such as the great seal, and so on, are not hard to get.

original: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
analyzed: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
translated: “Great bliss, great vajra”

original: zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub ste /
translated: means unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de'i gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thob pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thob pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: That is the cause of attaining the supreme commitment of its secret.

original: bstan pa ni snying po ste ;
analyzed: bstan pa ni snying po ste ;
translated: “Teaching” is the essence.

original: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'o //
translated: It is indestructible like a vajra.🔽The accomplishment of all powers is the accomplishment of the powers of the great seal, etc.

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni rigs thams cad la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang dag bshad pa de rnams dang po'i tshul ni yi ge h'um yin pas sgrub cing skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin te gang gi phyir yi ge h'um bzlas
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni rigs thams cad la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang dag bshad pa de rnams dang po'i tshul ni yi ge h'um yin pas sgrub cing skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin te gang gi phyir yi ge h'um bzlas
translated: , which are explained for all the clans. The cause of their accomplishment and generation is the first method, which is the letter hum.

original: pas de dag thams cad cad grub par gyur pa des na /🔽rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed //
analyzed: pas de dag thams cad cad grub par gyur pa des na / rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed //
translated: Because all of them are accomplished by the repetition of the letter hum,

original: ces bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ste /
translated: it is said that it is the cause of the swift accomplishment of all visualizations.🔽The visualizations of Vajrasattva, etc.

original: dum bu dang po dang / gnyis par rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rtog pa gang dag bshad pa de rnams myur du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dum bu dang po dang / gnyis par rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rtog pa gang dag bshad pa de rnams myur du sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: , which are explained in the first and second chapters, are swiftly accomplished by it.

original: thog mtha' med cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thog mtha' med cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is beginningless and endless.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni thog mar skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni thog mar skyes pa'o //
translated: The beginning is the first birth.

original: tha ma ni dus mtshams med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: tha ma ni dus mtshams med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The end is the nirvana without remainder.

original: gang la gnyis po de dag med pa de ni thog mtha' med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la gnyis po de dag med pa de ni thog mtha' med pa ste /
translated: That which is devoid of those two is beginningless and endless.

original: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bos rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bos rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He is always present in the aspect of the present.

original: dang por byung zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por yang da ltar @210a * //
analyzed: dang por byung zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por yang da ltar @210a * //
translated: In the beginning, in the beginning of the good aeon, etc.

original: byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kho na byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kho na byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: He is born in the aspect of the present.🔽The best, the first, is explained.

original: mchog dang po zhes bya bar bshad ces bya ba las mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dang po zhes bya bar bshad ces bya ba las mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: The best is the highest.

original: dang po'i ni bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar ro //
analyzed: dang po'i ni bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar ro //
translated: The first is the beginning of the good aeon.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan cing bsgrags pa'o //🔽tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod dang // zhes bya pa la tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na tshig thams cad de /
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan cing bsgrags pa'o // tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod dang // zhes bya pa la tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na tshig thams cad de /
translated: Explained means taught and proclaimed.🔽With all words, whatever is desired.

original: glu'i tshul bdun no //
analyzed: glu'i tshul bdun no //
translated: Words are also all, so all words are the seven modes of singing.

original: des gdul bya ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsung pas na /
analyzed: des gdul bya ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gsung pas na /
translated: With that, he speaks as desired by the disciples.

original: tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod pa //
analyzed: tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod pa //
translated: With all words, whatever is desired.

original: zhes bya'o // chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar //
translated: With all attachments, whatever is pleasing.

original: zhes bya ba ni glu'i lam gyi chags pa zhes bya ba gdangs kyi bye brag rnams kyis ci dga' bar zhes bya ba gdul bya rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar dga' zhing sred pa de bzhin du snying po de
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni glu'i lam gyi chags pa zhes bya ba gdangs kyi bye brag rnams kyis ci dga' bar zhes bya ba gdul bya rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar dga' zhing sred pa de bzhin du snying po de
translated: This is the so-called “path of song” attachment, by means of the various kinds of tones, as one likes, that is, as one delights in and desires, in order to cause the disciples to attain Vajrasattva, etc.

original: gsung bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gsung bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: One should utter that essence.

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Anurāgaya means “one should be attached.”

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin thabs dang / shes rab kyi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa yang dang yang du mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin thabs dang / shes rab kyi ngo bo ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa yang dang yang du mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: One should repeatedly manifest the nature of Vajrasattva, etc., which is the reality of method and wisdom, as it is. This is what is meant by “one should be attached.”

original: ji bzhin dbab pa'i ye shes 'jug //
analyzed: ji bzhin dbab pa'i ye shes 'jug //
translated: The wisdom enters just as it descends.🔽This is the so-called “path of dance” attachment, by means of the various kinds of dance movements, as one likes, that is, as one delights in and desires, in order to cause the disciples to attain Vajrasattva, etc.🔽One should utter that essence.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas mngon sum du bya ba ni ji bzhin dbab pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas mngon sum du bya ba ni ji bzhin dbab pa ste /
translated: This is the so-called “path of song” attachment, by means of the various kinds of tones, as one likes, that is, as one delights in and desires, in order to cause the disciples to attain Vajrasattva, etc.🔽One should utter that essence.🔽This is the so-called “path of dance” attachment, by means of the various kinds of dance movements, as one likes, that is, as one delights in and desires, in order to cause the disciples to attain Vajrasattva, etc.

original: der 'bab pa ni ye shes so //
analyzed: der 'bab pa ni ye shes so //
translated: One should utter that essence.

original: de la 'jug pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'o //
translated: Entering that is making it manifest.

original: de bas na ji lta ba bzhin du 'bab pa'i ye shes la rab tu 'jug pas na /
analyzed: de bas na ji lta ba bzhin du 'bab pa'i ye shes la rab tu 'jug pas na /
translated: Therefore, because he enters the pristine awareness that flows just as it is,

original: ci zhig 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug ces bya'o //
analyzed: ci zhig 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug ces bya'o //
translated: he is called the one who enters the pristine awareness that flows.

original: nye ba'i snying por bcas zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang lhan cig tu bcas pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying por bcas zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang lhan cig tu bcas pa'i snying po'o //
translated: Together with the essence, means together with the essence of the essence.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa kho na'o //
translated: Only means it is definitely only that.

original: bskal pa dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal ba bzang po la sogs pa'i dang po ste thog pa mar ro //
analyzed: bskal pa dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal ba bzang po la sogs pa'i dang po ste thog pa mar ro //
translated: The first eon means the first of the fortunate eons and so forth, the beginning.

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: It is said means it was taught.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te bskal ba bzang po'i dang por chags pa'i bskal ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkhar gyur par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs nas dang po kho nar //
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te bskal ba bzang po'i dang por chags pa'i bskal ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkhar gyur par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs nas dang po kho nar //
translated: This is the teaching: In the beginning of the fortunate eon, at the time of the eon of formation, when the buddhafield was space, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva, dwelling in the immeasurable palace as previously explained, first of all

original: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes @210b bya pa'i nye ba'i snying po h'um dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes @210b bya pa'i nye ba'i snying po h'um dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The essence mantra with the syllable HŪṀ, Anurāgāya HŪṀ, was spoken by the Lord just as it is.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: This is the syllable HŪṀ with the essence mantra.

original: gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni tshig thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: gsungs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni tshig thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa tsam gyis so //
translated: Just by being spoken means just by being spoken with all the words.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the buddhas are the same as the atoms in all world systems, Vairochana and so forth.

original: sras bcas pa ni byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: sras bcas pa ni byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'o //
translated: With their sons means with the bodhisattvas such as Maitreya.

original: rdo rje 'dzin bcas ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rgyal po dang / chags pa dang / legs pa la sogs pa rigs pa'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin bcas ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rgyal po dang / chags pa dang / legs pa la sogs pa rigs pa'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with the Vajra-holders means together with Vajrasattva, the King, Passion, Excellence, and so on, all the deities of the Vajra family.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nam mkha'i khams thams cad na rtag tu bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nam mkha'i khams thams cad na rtag tu bzhugs pa /
translated: The great Vajra-holders who always dwell in the realm of space,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: are various because they are the nature of all things, the body, speech, and mind of all the Tathagatas.

original: de dang lhan cig tu skad cig gis 'dus shing byon nas gcig tu tshogs par mdzad pas ni de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tu skad cig gis 'dus shing byon nas gcig tu tshogs par mdzad pas ni de skad ces bya'o //
translated: They assembled in an instant and came together with him, and so they are said to be assembled together.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bskul bas so //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bskul bas so //
translated: The great Vajradhara is Vajrasattva, who is aroused.

original: thog mar zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i bskal pa'i thog mar te bskal ba bzang po'i dang po'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: thog mar zhes bya ba ni chags pa'i bskal pa'i thog mar te bskal ba bzang po'i dang po'i tshe na'o //
translated: At the beginning means at the beginning of the passion eon, at the time of the first of the good eons.

original: yud kyis bya ba ni yud tsam kho nas yin gyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yud kyis bya ba ni yud tsam kho nas yin gyi dus gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: In an instant means in just an instant, not at another time.

original: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang bzhugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang bzhugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The three worlds are of the nature of the desire and form realms.

original: byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: byung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: Arisen means produced.

original: de gang gis phyung zhe na /
analyzed: de gang gis phyung zhe na /
translated: By whom was it produced?

original: 'dus par gyur nas gshegs pa'i rnam par snar mdzad la sogs pa'i ji skad du bshad pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: 'dus par gyur nas gshegs pa'i rnam par snar mdzad la sogs pa'i ji skad du bshad pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis so //
translated: By the Sugatas, Vairochana and so forth, who have come together and gone to the stage of union.

original: de ltar des sems can gyi khams bskyed pas ci zhig mdzad ce na /🔽dngos grub rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sems can gyi khams ji ltar bskyed pa de sangs rgyas nyid dam /
analyzed: de ltar des sems can gyi khams bskyed pas ci zhig mdzad ce na / dngos grub rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sems can gyi khams ji ltar bskyed pa de sangs rgyas nyid dam /
translated: Having thus produced the realm of sentient beings, what did he do?

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar ston ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dris pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar ston ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dris pa yin no //
translated: He asked the Blessed One Vajrasattva, “How will the realm of sentient beings become Buddhahood or Vajradharahood, just as it was produced?”

original: ji ltar dris pa yin zhe na //
analyzed: ji ltar dris pa yin zhe na //
translated: How did he ask?

original: ji ltar 'gro ba @211a * //
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro ba @211a * //
translated: “How will the world,

original: rang grub ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang grub ces bya ba smos te /
translated: self-established,🔽become the supreme vajra holder?”

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams sangs rgyas pa nyid dam /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi rang bzhin can gyi khams gsum pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams sangs rgyas pa nyid dam /
translated: The three worlds are the three realms of beings.🔽

original: rdo rje 'chang nyid du ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang nyid du ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: How could the realms of the beings of the three realms, which have the nature of the three worlds, be established as the state of a Buddha, or as Vajradhara?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rang nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dris par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rang nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dris par gyur pa'o //
translated: Those Tathagatas themselves asked the Lord Vajrasattva.

original: de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Those means the Sugatas.

original: bka' gsan nas zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i thos pa'i rang bzhin can gyis zhes pas nges par bzung nas so //
analyzed: bka' gsan nas zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i thos pa'i rang bzhin can gyis zhes pas nges par bzung nas so //
translated: Having heard means having ascertained by the nature of what was explained, having heard.

original: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o//
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o//
translated: Vajra holder is Vajrasattva.

original: ji lta bu zhe na rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: What is it like? He says himself, and so on.

original: rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kho nas so //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kho nas so //
translated: Himself means by himself alone.

original: 'gro ba ni sems can gyi khams so //
analyzed: 'gro ba ni sems can gyi khams so //
translated: The world is the realm of sentient beings.

original: 'byin pa ni 'dod pa na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'byin pa ni 'dod pa na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams bskyed pa'o //
translated: Bringing forth means generating the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa stsol bar mdzad pas na stsal ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa stsol bar mdzad pas na stsal ba'o //
translated: It is bestowed because it bestows Buddhahood, etc.

original: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa thob par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa thob par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
translated: It is taught because it teaches the cause for attaining Buddhahood, etc.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa skyed par mdzad pas na byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa skyed par mdzad pas na byed pa'o //
translated: It is done because it produces Buddhahood, etc.

original: tshig ni 'di skad ces gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tshig ni 'di skad ces gsungs zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal par gyur pa'o //
translated: The words he said means he spoke.

original: tshig ji lta bu zhig gsungs te zhe na /
analyzed: tshig ji lta bu zhig gsungs te zhe na /
translated: What kind of words did he speak?

original: 'jig rten 'dod chags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dod chags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He said, The thought of the world's desire and freedom from desire, etc.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir phyogs pa yin na chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir phyogs pa yin na chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The thought of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas is turned away from the enlightenment of the Buddha, because it is free from attachment.

original: des 'dul ba'i sems can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'jog cing dgod pas na 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: des 'dul ba'i sems can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'jog cing dgod pas na 'dul ba ste /
translated: It is tamed because it establishes and places sentient beings who are to be tamed in the enlightenment of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: de lta bus 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bus 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That world which is to be disciplined by such a one is so called.

original: chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur //
translated: It becomes pure by means of freedom from attachment.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni ji skad du bshad pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgoms pa'i sems nyid kyis dag par 'gyur zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni ji skad du bshad pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgoms pa'i sems nyid kyis dag par 'gyur zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur
translated: That world which is to be disciplined by means of freedom from attachment is purified by the mind of cultivation of the Śrāvaka and Pratyekabuddha enlightenments, as explained, and it becomes manifest in the Śrāvaka and Pratyekabuddha enlightenments.

original: ro // 'dir zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @211b chub don du gnyer ba'i 'jig rten rdo rje theg pa 'di la'o //
analyzed: ro // 'dir zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @211b chub don du gnyer ba'i 'jig rten rdo rje theg pa 'di la'o //
translated: Here means in this Vajra Vehicle of the world which is intent on the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: 'dod chags chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Great passion is Vajrasattva,

original: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the perfection of means.

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bor thar pa chen po'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bor thar pa chen po'o //
translated: Great bliss is the great liberation in the nature of the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni thabs gang gis na zhes rnam par rtog pa'o //

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las la rdo rje dang dril bu rtag tu 'chang bas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi las rnams rtag tu bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽ci'i phyir rdo rje dang dril bu bcang bar bya zhe na gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las la rdo rje dang dril bu rtag tu 'chang bas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi las rnams rtag tu bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // ci'i phyir rdo rje dang dril bu bcang bar bya zhe na gang gi phyir /
translated: Having performed the yoga of Vajrasattva, one should always hold the vajra and bell in the activities of the maṇḍala, and always perform the activities of all maṇḍalas. This is the meaning.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo'i rtog pa thams cad ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i stobs kyis dkyil 'khor du yang dag par 'jug cing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo'i rtog pa thams cad ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i stobs kyis dkyil 'khor du yang dag par 'jug cing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Why should one hold the vajra and bell? Because all the concepts of the nature of the vajra body, speech, and mind of Vajrasattva and so forth, by the power of holding the vajra and bell, enter and fully enter into the maṇḍala.

original: de bas @213b na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu 'jug cing 'bebs par byed pa'i rdo rje dril bu la ni dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas @213b na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu 'jug cing 'bebs par byed pa'i rdo rje dril bu la ni dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the vajra and bell that fully enter and descend into all maṇḍalas are called the three pledges.

original: rdo rje thams cad yang dag par 'bebs pas de ni sngags grub pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad yang dag par 'bebs pas de ni sngags grub pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: Since all vajras are fully descended, this is the seal of mantra accomplishment.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pas des na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pas des na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: Since it is so, therefore, one should play the vajra and bell in order to accomplish all powers such as the Great Seal and so forth.

original: rdo rje dang dril bu bsgrags pa des //
analyzed: rdo rje dang dril bu bsgrags pa des //
translated: By playing the vajra and bell,

original: ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how will it be?

original: cho ga lhag gam mtshang yang //
analyzed: cho ga lhag gam mtshang yang //
translated: If the rite is incomplete or defective,

original: 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o //
translated: it will be accomplished, not to be disparaged.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated.

original: rnal 'byor 'bad pas 'jug par gyur kyang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'bad pas 'jug par gyur kyang /
translated: Even if the yogī has applied himself with effort,

original: gal te bag med pas cho ga lhag pa'am mtshang bar gyur na 'di la dril bu'i sgras bskang bar byas te des nyes pa gnyis dang ldan par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bag med pas cho ga lhag pa'am mtshang bar gyur na 'di la dril bu'i sgras bskang bar byas te des nyes pa gnyis dang ldan par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: if he is careless and the rite is incomplete or defective, it is made up for by the sound of the bell. By that, the yogī who has the two faults will certainly accomplish the power as desired.

original: de ni nyes pa gnyis po des smad par bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni nyes pa gnyis po des smad par bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It is stated that he is not to be disparaged because of those two faults.

original: yang dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: Again, how is the maṇḍala to be accomplished?

original: dkyil 'khor gnas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽sa spyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga gsang ba mthon po las gsungs pa'i sbyor bas sam /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / sa spyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba dang / byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga gsang ba mthon po las gsungs pa'i sbyor bas sam /
translated: The place of the maṇḍala, etc.

original: gsang ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir gnas spyang ba legs par byas la dkyil 'khor gyis de'i dbus su der rig pa'i brtul zhugs sngon du spyad pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni cho ga
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir gnas spyang ba legs par byas la dkyil 'khor gyis de'i dbus su der rig pa'i brtul zhugs sngon du spyad pa'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni cho ga
translated: Having thoroughly purified the place by the method taught in the Secret High Tantra, or by the method explained in the Secret Tantra, the master who has previously practiced the vidyā conduct should accomplish the maṇḍala there in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of “according to the rite.”

original: de ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be accomplished?

original: dngos grub byin brlab cho ga yis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dngos grub byin brlab cho ga yis // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: By the rite of consecrating the siddhi.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The rite of consecrating the siddhi of the maṇḍala is the rite of consecrating the siddhi.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyi rjes thogs nyid la 'og nas ston pa'i glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i cho gas bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyi rjes thogs nyid la 'og nas ston pa'i glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'i cho gas bya ba yin no //
translated: Immediately after the accomplishment of the maṇḍala, one should perform with the rite of the offering of song and music that will be taught below.

original: de la dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i dkyil 'khor te bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i dkyil 'khor te bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: There, the so-called maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of goddesses that is to be accomplished.

original: da ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /🔽glu dang rol mo zhes @214a * //
analyzed: da ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir / glu dang rol mo zhes @214a * //
translated: Now, in order to teach the rite of the consecration of the accomplishment,

original: bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin te de la rdo rje glu la sogs pa ni glu'o //
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin te de la rdo rje glu la sogs pa ni glu'o //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares “song and music,” and so on. There, the song is the vajra song, and so on.

original: rdo rje rol mo la sogs pa ni rol mo'o /
analyzed: rdo rje rol mo la sogs pa ni rol mo'o /
translated: The music is the vajra music, and so on.

original: de bdag nyid kyis mchod pa ni mchod pa yin pas glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyis mchod pa ni mchod pa yin pas glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The offering is the offering with that nature, thus it is the offering of song and music.

original: me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis ;
analyzed: me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis ;
translated: By the offering of flowers, incense, and so on,

original: / zhes bya ba ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / dar dang / bla bre dang / na bza' dang / me tog gi shing la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / dar dang / bla bre dang / na bza' dang / me tog gi shing la sogs pa ni /
translated: This is the fivefold worship, and also parasols, banners, flags, flower garlands, silk, canopies, robes, flower trees, etc.

original: spos la sogs pa mchod pa yis //
analyzed: spos la sogs pa mchod pa yis //
translated: With incense, etc., worship.

original: zhes bya'o ; / mchog dang po ni brtag par bya //
analyzed: zhes bya'o ; / mchog dang po ni brtag par bya //
translated: The supreme one should be imagined.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid bsam par bya ba'i tshul can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid bsam par bya ba'i tshul can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
translated: The supreme one is the mandala of the goddess, which has the nature of color and shape, and is to be imagined by the method of the object of thought. One should generate the mandala of the goddess of the Blessed One.

original: ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni phyi'i yo byad ji snyed pas so //
analyzed: ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni phyi'i yo byad ji snyed pas so //
translated: As many as there are means as many as there are external requisites.

original: ci 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ci 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ci 'dod pa'o //
translated: Whatever one desires means whatever size one desires.

original: ci'i phyir tshad ci 'dod par brtag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir tshad ci 'dod par brtag par bya zhe na /
translated: Why should one imagine whatever size one desires?

original: mchog dang po zhes bya ba smos te gang gi phyir 'di ni mchog dang po yin zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba yin pas na thog ma med cing tha ma dang dbus kyi cha yang med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
analyzed: mchog dang po zhes bya ba smos te gang gi phyir 'di ni mchog dang po yin zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba yin pas na thog ma med cing tha ma dang dbus kyi cha yang med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
translated: It is called the “supreme first,” because it is the supreme first, and because it arises from the cause of the dharma-dhātu, it is said to be “without beginning, middle, or end.”

original: go // rtsa mo zhes bya ba ni mtha'i cha'o //
analyzed: go // rtsa mo zhes bya ba ni mtha'i cha'o //
translated: The “peak” is the final part.

original: gang la mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de ni mtha' yas mchog ste /
analyzed: gang la mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de ni mtha' yas mchog ste /
translated: That which has no end is “infinitely supreme,”

original: mtha' dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' dang bral ba'o //
translated: free from extremes.

original: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas bla na med pa'o //
translated: “Unsurpassed” means that there is nothing higher than it.

original: rgyu 'di nyid kyis na 'di la 'dra ba'i dpe gzhan med pas na dpe med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu 'di nyid kyis na 'di la 'dra ba'i dpe gzhan med pas na dpe med pa'o //
translated: For this very reason, since there is no other example like it, it is “without example.”

original: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
analyzed: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
translated: It is well-established in all space.

original: zhes bya ba ni zla ba ltar thams cad du snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zla ba ltar thams cad du snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that it appears everywhere like the moon.

original: grong khyer zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: grong khyer zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: “City” means maṇḍala.

original: de ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu bzhugs pas na mi 'gyur mchog ces bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu bzhugs pas na mi 'gyur mchog ces bya ste /
translated: Since it exists as the essence of that which has arisen in that way, it is called “unchanging supreme,”

original: rtag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: which means “permanent.”

original: ji ltar na mi 'gyur ba'i mchog pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi 'gyur ba'i mchog pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it the supreme unchanging?

original: thog ma med mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thog ma med mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The “supreme beginningless” and so on are stated.

original: gang gi phyir @214b 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas rtag tu 'khor bar bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir @214b 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas rtag tu 'khor bar bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Since all tathāgatas equal to the subtle particles of all world systems have arisen and always abide in saṃsāra,

original: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma byung na yang zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma byung na yang zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: the word “also” indicates that they abide even when they have not arisen.

original: bzhugs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas shing bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas shing bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Abiding means existing and remaining through the essence of the present.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: grong khyer de ni mi 'gyur mchog //
analyzed: grong khyer de ni mi 'gyur mchog //
translated: that city is unchanging supreme.

original: ces bya'o // gal te bzhugs gnas de nam mkha' thams cad la gnas pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya'o // gal te bzhugs gnas de nam mkha' thams cad la gnas pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no //
translated: If that place of abiding is equal to space because it abides in all space,

original: ji ltar na so so'i skye bo rnam par rtog pa lhan cig ma tshang bas kun du gang ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na so so'i skye bo rnam par rtog pa lhan cig ma tshang bas kun du gang ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is the world of ordinary beings filled with non-associated conceptualization?

original: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid kyis na //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid kyis na // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Because of the equality of the best of all,🔽the equality of the best of all is the suchness of all dharmas.

original: de bzhin nyid bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽tha ma dbus med nam mkha' ni //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // tha ma dbus med nam mkha' ni //
translated: By cultivating suchness, one becomes filled with the best of all.🔽The city is like space, without end or middle.

original: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' gang la mtha' 'am dbus med pa de ni grong khyer 'di'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' gang la mtha' 'am dbus med pa de ni grong khyer 'di'o ;
translated: The city is like space, because space is without end or middle.

original: / mtha' dang dbus med pa na 'di la dkyil yang med do zhe na /
analyzed: / mtha' dang dbus med pa na 'di la dkyil yang med do zhe na /
translated: If it is without end or middle, how can it have a center?

original: 'di yi dbus mar brtags pa na //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di yi dbus mar brtags pa na // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The center is imagined in the middle of the four directions.

original: 'di'i dbus mang brtags pas na 'di dbus kyi tha snyad 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i dbus mang brtags pas na 'di dbus kyi tha snyad 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The center is imagined in the middle of the four directions, and so the term center is used.

original: tha ma bzhi'i cha mnyam pa la ltos nas tshad du bya ba nyid 'di'i dbus kyi char ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: tha ma bzhi'i cha mnyam pa la ltos nas tshad du bya ba nyid 'di'i dbus kyi char ji ltar brtag par bya zhe na /
translated: How can the center be imagined in the middle of the four directions, which are equal in extent?

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtag pa 'di'i dbus nyid ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtag pa 'di'i dbus nyid ces gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, this is the center of the samadhi of the seal-union.

original: mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis gnas 'di nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dbus kyi char slob dpon gyis brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis gnas 'di nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dbus kyi char slob dpon gyis brtag par bya'o //
translated: From this place of the nature of the unchanging, the master should imagine the center of the mandala with the samadhi of the great seal of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /🔽de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na / de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: What should he do there?🔽He should make a great lotus with a stem,

original: der zhes bya ba bzhugs gnas de'i dbus su slob dpon gyis yu bar bcas zhes bya ba sdong bu dang bcas pa'i padma chen po bya'o ;
analyzed: der zhes bya ba bzhugs gnas de'i dbus su slob dpon gyis yu bar bcas zhes bya ba sdong bu dang bcas pa'i padma chen po bya'o ;
translated: in the center of that place.

original: / de khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /🔽sna tshogs 'dab mas yang dag khebs //
analyzed: / de khyad par ji lta bu zhe na / sna tshogs 'dab mas yang dag khebs //
translated: What is its special feature?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is completely covered with various petals.

original: kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'i 'dab ma dang ldan pas kun du khebs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'i 'dab ma dang ldan pas kun du khebs pa'o //
translated: It is completely covered with petals of blue, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: ci'i phyir kha dog sna lngas kun @215a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir kha dog sna lngas kun @215a * //
translated: Why are they all five colors?🔽

original: tu khebs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: tu khebs pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it completely covered with five colors?

original: thams cad dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, “all pure,” and so on.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thams cad dag pa'i gdan du gyur pa ni padma de yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thams cad dag pa'i gdan du gyur pa ni padma de yin la /
translated: Because the nature of the great mind of enlightenment, the mirror-like, the equality, the individualizing, and the duty-fulfillment wisdoms is glorious Vajrasattva, the seat of all purity, that is the lotus.

original: de bas na ye shes sna tshogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ston par byed pas na kha dog sna tshogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ye shes sna tshogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ston par byed pas na kha dog sna tshogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is of various colors, because it shows the purity of the various wisdoms.

original: de nas thig ni gdab byas te //
analyzed: de nas thig ni gdab byas te //
translated: Then, having laid out the lines,

original: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul dang / slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad lhag par gnas par byas nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slob dpon gyis ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas srad bu dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang de nas thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul dang / slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad lhag par gnas par byas nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slob dpon gyis ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas srad bu dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang de nas thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the consecration of the disciple and all the deities of the mandala, at sunrise, the master should perform the rite as explained, and then lay out the thread of the mandala, twice the size of the mandala, and lay out the lines.

original: tshad ji tsam zhe na /🔽nam mkha' kun gyi tshad kyis ni //
analyzed: tshad ji tsam zhe na / nam mkha' kun gyi tshad kyis ni //
translated: What is the measure of the mandala?🔽The measure of the mandala is immeasurable,

original: tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin //
analyzed: tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin //
translated: by the measure of all space.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin pas de'i phyir /
translated: Because this mandala is equal to space,

original: 'di la khru la sogs pa'i tshad kyis nges par mi bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di la khru la sogs pa'i tshad kyis nges par mi bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: it is not to be determined by a measure of cubits, etc.

analyzed: de ltar na mi mnyam pa med pas na dkyil 'khor 'di ni zur bzhi pa yin no //

analyzed: bsam @215b gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //

analyzed: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de dag gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to illustrate them,

original: dra ba me long me tog che //
analyzed: dra ba me long me tog che //

analyzed: me tog phreng ba rgyan gyis bskor //

original: zhes bya ba 'di bris pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di bris pa yin no //

analyzed: kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni //

analyzed: tshul de ltar bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas dang / dang po'i gnas bri par bya'o //
translated: In this way, the abode of great bliss Vajrasattva and the first abode should be drawn.

analyzed: de ltar 'di yan chad kyi gzhung gis ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ston par gyur pa yin no //

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: ci zhig gi rang bzhin yin zhe na /

original: 'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste//

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni bshad zin to //

translated: By just that nature, it bestows all mundane and supramundane bliss.

translated: The wheel of the sutra-collection of the bodhisattva path together with its result, which has the nature of the thought of enlightenment of the disciples of the Great Vehicle, etc., is turned and generated in the mind-streams of the disciples.

analyzed: ras dkar po la sogs pa la tshon gyis bris pa ni bris pa'o //

analyzed: 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la //

original: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //

analyzed: dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na sangs rgyas thams cad de de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //

original: dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dga' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni dga' ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /

original: dga' ba chen po ste /

original: chen po nyid ni byang chub kyis tshan nyid can rdo rje ral pa ma dang / rdo rje k'i li ki la gnyis kyis gnyis su med pa'i thugs mngon du byas pas thams cad du khyab cing ;

original: de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das //

translated: great passion, great joy.🔽Joy is the cause of the non-abiding nirvana of infinite delight and nondiscontent, and it arises from the natural outflow of the wisdom of discernment.

original: dga' ba ni dga' zhing ma gu ba mtha' yas pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rdo rje dran pa dang / rdo rje dran ma'i ngo bo dga' ba 'di la mnga' bas na dga' ba chen po'o //
